Sw7WEMK9-5kVB053jKzsUA.text: I enjoy going the Scottsdale location for topgolf. I would recommend coming here during the day time rather than night time because it can get very busy! Their service is quick and attentive to their customers. The food is decent, I've only tried a few items on their menu like their turkey wrap, chicken wings, donut holes, pizza, fries, and chicken burger. The background view is pretty cool at night.

ebg10Jh5jEqe1HlcNsFAUQ.text: My husband and I visited Topgolf for the first time while in Scottsdale on vacation. I was a little nervous because I have golfed less times than the amount of fingers on one hand, but to my surprise it was a blast!! There were a variety of customers with a variety of skill level, so I did not feel self conscious! The food was great, our server was attentive, and the drinks were delicious! Overall, total blast and we will be visiting Topgolf again!

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bae in the Bay

JI98D4_Djl9dSZJ5oodatg.text: I love coming to topgolf! Even if your not great at golf you can still have a great time. I love coming at night cause the lights change as well.   Came here a week or to ago and wanted to play around 7:30pm and it was a 2 hour wait. So we left and I scheduled a bay online for 6:30pm and when we got here it was quick and easy. They sent us to our bay right away.  When we got up stairs and found our bay there was someone there to help us. We swiped our playing cards and there was 4 time slots you can choose from to play 1) 30 mins 2) 45 mins 3) 1 1/5 mins 4) 2 hrs. We chose an hour & half. We got to play 3 1/2 games but there was 9 of us.   We ordered the 24 injectable doughnut holes & you can pick 2 creams. We choose bavarian cream & chocolate. They were both really good. Also we ordered the signature nachos it was so delicious & definitely not enough for all of us that we had to order another one.   They have seating up stairs. They have games like pool & Kinect & etc.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Signature nachos

L5GPXEjHWuBTw38qCeorqw.text: Came here for my wife's birthday and Jack West and Hannah took care of us above and beyond. They wrangled together a birthday card for her. Was such a great experience. We will be back!

hTBdmh4V_gB83OojWJLWJQ.text: Top golf is a lot of fun and a great atmosphere.  A perfect way to make golf a social game! My kids loved coming here.  The food is really good too.

KDFfC2Wv5k-DA0dW5h5I8A.text: I usually go to the Gilbert Location but this location next to Talking Stick is way better, the staff are very helpful and got us a lane pretty quick on a Saturday Night. They also do things differently with the cards and you also get text messages throughout the process saying...Your lane is ready and do you need more time? The bar while we waited was also very nice and they took care of the 4 of us quickly

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

V7p-gaYp7N0TFJwAfLxMyQ.text: If there's anything I dislike more than bowling it's golf, so imagine my delight when our team building activity for the evening lands us at Topgolf.. this is my happy face guys..no seriously.   One thing I had to give them right away is that it's a very beautiful facility. The wrap around covered seating with spritzing fans all facing a colored light up green grassy range. It was almost like being at Disneyland.. almost.  I have to agree with other reviewers that this place is not just for the golf show offs, it's a great place for anyone and definitely a fun experience for group outings. We had about 25 of us with only a couple decent golfers in the mix. Many of us ladies had to take off our high heels when it was our turn, and a few even sent the ball flying in directions that seemed to defy physics.   The servers were very attentive and kept the drinks flowing all night long, which definitely improved my golf game, or at the very least made me care less when I swung with purpose and totally missed the ball.. what can I say guys, I got skillz. Ordering food here was a little more challenging for a VIP allergy member of the glutenisgross club. There was definitely a lot of uncertainty when I first asked about gf options, and when they brought me out a stapled paper packet with allergy info there was nothing gf on the menu. Even the shrimp cocktail had gluten..Perfect. I was almost to the point of ordering an Uber eats meal when luckily a concerned server came over. He said he'd heard I have celiac and could ask the kitchen to just grill me some chicken served with sliced avocado and corn tortillas off menu. This guy saved the day cause I was morphing into hangry golfer, much more dangerous and unpredictable.   With snacks on board, drinks supplied at a steady pace, and some fab Backstreet Boys jams that led to some interpretive dance with the girls, this ended up being a fine Phoenix night.

XSMnXPYNLr8tC_pqjgeoQg.text: Super cool place and the nice thing is you really don't have to be good at golf to really enjoy it! Bays fit up to 6 people, service is quite friendly and responsive! Food was surprisingly good and a huge selection of drinks!! This place is great for everything, from a small group of friends to a full blown office party! Highly recommend!!

GLsBxL2joSlNStgqD4N6BQ.text: My first review still stands as far as it being a fun place and a beautiful setting.  My update is on the drinks. They have gone down hill! The mixed drinks were so WEAK but yet the prices still stayed on the higher side. I don't mind paying if the drink is going to be worth it. This was just an expensive mixer. It's not worth it. Did some drunken idiot fall off and ruin it for everyone else?  We ended up leaving to go to a local bar.

7yqQezX1L3i6497CWjlWhw.text: Super fun! A great way to spend an evening with friends and/or family!  Even the kids had fun! Good for beginners and experts too.

woaMMGVZNyLide0ul33mgw.text: Have you ever been to a bowling alley, but wondered if it could be golf-focused? That is top golf in a nutshell. It isn't cheap, about 35 bucks per hour but it's nice to practice and you can go with nothing and the wrong clothes  and zero experience and still have fun.  I went with my dad, an accomplished golfer and he loved it. You can aim for a target that your skill level can hit and earning points for your shots is cool. The view of the mountains is pretty spectacular too.   It's also great for kids, there's a game room on the lower level for them and a bar mid-level for the adults. Drinks and food are hella pricey. That's snottsdale for you though.  You can bring your own clubs but they have ones there that are decent too.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

JFb0wbQdb6BkMsTM2Dgh2w.text: Came to Topgolf for the first time for a recruitment event.  We had a great time!  From the golfing competition (apparently once someone initiates this part of the game, you get NEGATIVE points for getting your ball in the wrong hole, thanks for telling me guys), to the tasty margaritas, this was a great experience and a very cool alternative to a normal recruitment dinner.  The only thing - I wasn't much of a fan of the food.  We had some standard Mexican fare (tacos, etc.), but after having cheap legitimate Mexican taco-truck food for years, I wasn't too impressed.  I'll have to try the sushi or some other dish next time.

VuM6ocFykF17JzKsSw_VOw.text: While the Phoenix Open was getting rained out, this was a convenient location to go and hit a few golf balls.  I had a great time.  I had a bloody Mary, that was fantastic, to get the day started.    You should visit their website for details, but they charge by the hour.  And depending on the time of day, the price per hour increases as the day progresses.  We went in the morning at the $25 an hour rate.    There are a variety of different games one can play.    The food was surprisingly good.  My only issue with this place is the lack of "scalable" fun.  How about small kids?  I know a gang of pre schoolers would love to play golf there, but they probably would never get a ball in a target.  Docking TG a star for that .

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bay 216... Dead center

w8B3YR9Re5OnTsZ7Xo-4Pw.text: A great place to take family, friends or business clients. It's also a great date night idea, too! I've come here probably 10 times over the last few years. It's always a great experience. Food is decent. Drinks are good. It's just flat-out fun!

kRYl8EUNqi4M36rhvyncLA.text: Every time I come here for dinner, I end up waiting literally 20+ minutes for a waiter/waitress to come over so I can order food. They're all just standing around chatting with each other. Worst. Service. Ever. I'm appalled by how bad it is here.

RVDtPeCQPn0MHJ9HKUXwIQ.text: So much fun... no experience needed  Great food and plenty to drink.  TV's for football watching

mVjS4rOVAlPlXmoHkpslAA.text: Best Too Golf we have been to! Service was friendly, food was fast, and the place is beautiful (and super clean). Five stars driven by the service piece, and the food quality. The staff that waited on us was just extremely pleasant. Every one of them, down to the food runners. It really made our experience.

BuAum4ycexbJpmw-o9kiJg.text: After having heard many stories of how much fun my friends have had at Topgolf, I was really excited to finally get a chance to play. We had gone on a Saturday afternoon so there was a little bit of a crowd, however the wait time to get a bay was much shorter then I expected. The cost at the time we went was $35/hour; since we were splitting it 8 ways, it was very affordable.  Our bay was on the second floor towards the end so we got an area with a table and couches. My only qualm with this was that it was a little bit uncomfortable because we all had ordered food, and we felt that it would've been easier if we would've had a high top table and chairs (I wonder if you can request a bay that has that?). The great part was that our waitress was on point in getting us food & drink refills quickly & made some good suggestions. The price of the food was about what I expected & everything we got was tasty. I recommend the smores!!  It's a good thing that we were just playing for fun because the scoring system is a little awkward. Sometimes someone would hit a really good shot and it would not go into one of the scoring zones so they're get 0 points & the next person would hit not as good of a shot but the ball would keep rolling and land in a high scoring zone. I'm not good at golf so I didn't have high expectations for myself. I thought lowest points normally wins in golf anyways, right?  All and all, it was a really good time so we'll be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mushi!

wdd8MaJ_hBUrRSb7qiIqzg.text: Well I don't like giving bad reviews but this is an exception.  I love Top Golf and always have fun when I go.  The restaurant however is a different story.  Tonight 6 of us went to the restaurant and for the most part it was ok for the other people in our group, food was good and there were no complaints.  I however cannot say the same.  I told the waiter I wanted the fried chicken sandwich with no cilantro coleslaw on it.  I'm sure he heard me because he nodded his head and said "No coleslaw" and I said yes.  Low and behold it was delivered with the coleslaw.  I should have sucked it up and ate it, but I HATE COLESLAW!  Waiter apologized and took it back and promptly forgot about me.  I waited 40 minutes to get my sandwich with no coleslaw on it.  When it arrived I declined to take it.  Everyone else was done eating, and I was a bit upset about it and had lost my appetite by then.  Luckily I grabbed the Tator tots of the original plate to tie me over.  Only problem...they were very cold.  Manager stopped by and apologized I accepted his apology and he said that he would take care of it for us.  Cool!  Well that didn't happen.  We got the check and lo and behold they charged us for the chicken sandwich.  I told the waiter I was not going to pay for something I didn't eat.  He took it off the bill then.  Not acceptable.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Qob7ggYMA_Znd2ZOtOZO2A.text: Went here for a work event where we had over 50 people, they were very accommodating, very friendly, and everywhere we needed them to be! Top golf is always s fun place to just have a great time at!

zlZSkQwoZ9uwc-94epnSVA.text: If you're going to TopGolf you pretty much know what you're getting. It's a driving range with beer and some higher end pub food. It's pretty expensive and there is a very long wait if you don't make a reservation (reservations cost $50 and that doesn't go towards food or golf) and even with a reservation expect to wait 15-20 minutes to be seated. The staff is very friendly and the service is quick. Can't go wrong with TopGolf for a relaxing night with friends.

iGdOUVWzKGaD4A-M3MsnYw.text: Top Golf is a wonderful family experience.  It is designed for all levels of golf and players can be of mixed abilities.  It sure beats a bowling alley for a similar type of group activity and the food is more appealing. I would consider Top Golf for a company outing, celebration or family activity.

-_dtZDXhk-NGdA-6NAU4jw.text: "Obviously, you're not a golfer"  That line from The Big Lebowski echoed in my head as we drove to Topgolf, where I was sure my lack of golfing skills would be made apparent for the whole world to see. on the contrary, it turned into one of the most fun group outtings I've ever had thanks to laid-back atmosphere, a top-notch facility and plenty of liquor.   Our group reserved two sections on the second deck. Walking to our location, I was already impressed by the vastness of the facility, with multiple levels of folks driving their balls off into the horizon and a massive bar inside where people caroused and watched sports. Our section consisted of some comfy furniture, driving greens with a cool laser-operated ball feeder and some handy electronic scoreboards. My game didn't improve much, but I had a blast and our friendly servers kept the green beer (it was St. Patrick's Day) and tasty apps flowing.   This mixture of low key athleticism, socializing and drinking make Topgolf a perfect spot for a date, a group outting or a solo meditation getaway. I just hope they eventually open a branch in my neck of the woods!

frIlCsrrqCU9zm1OEiPOrg.text: This is such a great place for golfers and non golfers. I saw people coming in with their own clubs, but that was not me. I was here to have fun and to enjoy the food. I know they often have wait times but we went on Labor Day at 6:00 P.M. and were immediately shown to a table. They showed us how to use the system and within minutes Austin was taking our drink order. Drinks and appys were served quickly. The presentation on all of the food is awesome.  We ordered the bacon Mac and cheese spring rolls, the buffalo chicken sliders, quesadillas, and a sunrise burger. Everything was so scrumptious! Many items on the menu are perfect for sharing. One would have to work hard to not have a good time here. At night the music gets turned up a bit and the targets flash to the beat. Perfect for families, although probably not little ones.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Burger with tater tots

sEBO7VWrmQJC-thMVDe3Nw.text: Excellent place for a team outing, party, or get together.  About 40 of us went to TopGolf recently.  We had a great time and the staff there was awesome.  We had 4 bays set up and had a couple personal waiters to help us out.  There were about 4 people from their crew that got us all set up.  The drink menu was very good.  We tried several appetizers and they were all pretty good.  It was bar food type options but done fresh and well.  I would definitely come back here again and recommend it to others.

iBEv6MUZGhWkLv3FkURwnA.text: Been here twice to golf now and there has been a problems each time.  Really took the fun out of it.   Will not return.  Very disappointed!   Shouldn't be so difficult to have fun.

VG2DSaAFP9ywHNe8jlFP7A.text: So it looks like I have a new favorite place in the universe.   While I'm a loud and vocal proponent of all things mini-golf, I had never before stepped foot onto a driving range. I don't know what I was doing with the past 35 years of my life, but I do know it all sucked compared to my time at Topgolf. This place is the shiz.  When we arrived we were escorted to our reserved stations, which had climate-controlled couch seating in the back, and some pretty dang high-tech tees up in the front. The system is able to scan a sensor in your golf ball and if you hit one of their targets, you get points! Matt Fact: I LOVE POINTS! It's my philosophy that everything in life is a competition, some more obvious than others. If I'm able to objectively show that I scored more points than somebody else, then I'm having a pretty great day.   While waiting for your turn, you can hang back with pretty good food and drink, brought to you be a server. I was particularly fond of the Palomas, and all of the bites I sampled were tasty.   This would be a great date, double date, friend outing, or company team builder. I can't wait until they open a location closer to my home in Portland.

-R6VaUkky-MxcLIgId00cA.text: Driving Range + with a little mix of bowling + Full Bar/Restaurant = Topgolf.   This place place is awesome! Perfect for a corporate team bonding event, or if you just want to unwind over happy hour with some golfing buddies. It's also family-friendly as well.  I must preface this review by saying - I am NOT a golfer. Sure, I've taken a few swings here and there. And I can play a pretty mean game of putt-putt/min-golf, but driving ranges aren't really my jam. That being said, me and my novice crew all had a blast swinging and drinking away while soaking up the glorious Arizona sunset.  Food and drinks were surprisingly top-notch. Our hungry crew noshed on an assortment of small bites, including: queso + chips, pot stickers/dipping sauce; bruschetta; and other gourmet goodies. And i must admit, the drinks weren't too shabby either. I had a few Old Fashioned cocktails and they were well-balanced and strong (perhaps that is why my golf game kept getting better?). : )  All in all, Topgolf was a great way to finish off our day in Scottsdale. I'd come back here in a heartbeat!

nHXD2YT8nJGB_Y-0dosaww.text: Nick Lord gave me incredible customer service at my bay. and he's only 17, wow.

Xzz2W6-VzTfZQhO6PVXsTw.text: Full disclosure: I enjoyed all the glory of Topgolf on a company outing, so I can't really speak to the process of making a group reservation, menu planning, etc. Our group of 14+ was greeted at the door and escorted to our reserved space pretty much right away, lucky us! I recommend booking in advance if you can....there was a sizable line at the entrance. Clearly, this place is popular! Anyone can play Topgolf, from aspiring pros to those who've never held a gold club. All you had to do is try! It's likely you'll have a great time. It's basically a driving range, full service bar/pub and arcade all in one! You might never want to leave. It's pretty addicting and I think I scored a grand total of 18 points. The food was pretty darned good too. Bites and sips are similar to what you'd find at a gastropub. We snacked on shareables like guacamole, queso and shrimp. For those that opt out from the golf game...there's plenty of seating to kick back and relax. I'll be back! But can you please open a Topgolf in Tucson? I'll even settle for Marana :)

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Three tiers of fun!
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. View from tier one!
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

D6bCl6_iBCgw4PUYuuWpGA.text: Second time to TG. Had a blast the first time as a Fathers Day gift from the family. We really enjoyed it and looked forward to this visit to now show my mom. This time  we were met at the door by staff advising of a policy change that we cannot use our drivers, woods or hybrids due to possibility if hitting over the net.  Really? You didn't think about that when you built the place?  Assured them that my 86 year old mom would hold back and not launch her 350 yard drives, nor would my wife or I.  Then told we had to leave the woods, hybrids at the desk and if we use our irons we were restricted to the lower level only.   Really?!  What's next?   With all the restrictions we decided just to leave and enjoy a nice dinner elsewhere.   It's really a shame that TG has been reduced to this.

DAa6AvWRoROEZZbyu8q4Nw.text: Always a great time here. Drinks and food are great. Service is just a little lacking, took way too long just for an appetizer. All together great place & good fun.

VT9o1hoHt_43yDsliQFw4g.text: We had a lot of fun. We went with a party of 8 adults and got there around 5:45. When we first got there, there was some confusion and we were not only switched 3 times but then we had to switch "lanes" one more time after our final spot was not working. Would have given less stars if a manager hadn't come to us and given us an extra hour. We each ordered a couple of appetizers and they were all good. My favorite was the pickle fries and even the macaroni and cheese fried with bacon was good. We had a good time. The only thing I would tell someone going is that it might be worth a wait to go higher up. The holes light up and night and it might be part of the fun to be able to see them better. (But not sure it's worth a 3 hour wait which is what we hear it is sometimes.)

xp9lrQnhKkzsV8D8JL-deQ.text: This place is the best place ever! So much fun for everyone! Doesn't matter your age or skill.  Great place to spend with the kiddos. I'm already planning my return!.

DWTcTaX_ADpnTpso6HEBrg.text: I love to golf and when it came to top golf it was a blast yeah it may be a two hour wait at times but it's definitely worth the wait you get to eat and hang out while waiting and after you can go to the lounge and relax and watch some tv definitely the best driving range around

JU_S_ZDsq3mezuGib4-LNA.text: This place is awesome!!! Came here last Saturday afternoon with the boyfriend and we had a great time!   Once we got settled in, we ordered drinks (I had the Strawberry Mule and the bf got a beer) and food (chicken with waffles and an order of the cheese beer dip with chips).   The game was sooo much fun!!! I don't play golf and I had a blast. We played on the first level but next time we'll ask for the 2nd level.  We'll def be coming back this summer!!! If your wondering what to wear, wear comfy, casual clothes and sneakers. Have fun!!

AiLTlz4lMjgxi9G-CG6gzQ.text: This place was fun and all but the service sucks took 2 hours for our food to come and by the time our food came it was already time to go, top golf in Houston was much more better even though there were more people the service was outstanding.

TYZ7OI3iZovY3_t2evrUaQ.text: Had a blast too much fun. Great team building Chloe was one of the staff that engaged with us and made us feel welcome.

Fv5AzrGbqIOAc2KBDcxsgg.text: Kelton G was an awesome server! A True hole in one! We had a great time and we will definitely be back.

vREgsBtr0MPXhIvsE_FfDA.text: What a great time at an amazing venue!  Great views.  Great service and super fun game!

sIT0DdIy1Vwf7dHXZbuo4A.text: Great place for beginners or experts. Cool place to hang out, play, and just enjoy time with friends. Food service though needs work. Very slow and the food isn't that good.

mTixQHwAWdKzgkx2BT39zQ.text: What a fun experience this is! I arrived reasonable early about 10am, and I signed up for 30 minutes since it was my first visit and I wanted to see how it all worked. It was just myself and my wife, I was the only one hitting balls, while my wife used the the free wi-fi. Our hitting station have a 5 seat high top or I could have request a sofa seating about the same number, we have our own TV with the college football on and a screen for everyone to see the hitter scores and distances. I had a great time the 30 minute flew by, I will be back with friends for some friendly competition! The food & drink were reasonable prices but prices per hour do go up the later in the day you visit, but if you are splitting it 3-4 ways it's not bad, depending on how much beer you drink!

HLo1_wx-ZOgvAX2vRSuVCw.text: I think it's a little expensive, especially since I suck at golfing but it is fun. I still enjoy it even though I'm not that great, and I think that's what is so great about it is you don't have to be a pro at golfing to have fun here.

9h-DvjpoF-_g6ju2wGrBcQ.text: I'm the VP of People (HR) for a company here in Phoenix. We recently held a company event at TopGolf in Scottsdale, and it was AWESOME! Everybody had a fantastic time. The staff was just terrific. Our employees brought their families, and the kids had a ball. The TopGolf staff was excellent with the kids and took lots of time to help the newbie-golfers (kids and adults) learn and get comfortable. The private room was perfect and the food was great too. A+. 5-Stars. 100%. I highly recommend TopGolf, and I know we'll be back.

DWG7lWyNdKH5MY96WsAYNg.text: Top golf was a blast! I would definitely recommend going with a group of 4-6, because it costs $40-45 per hour, per pod. You can have up to 6 people per pod. I went with 3 other people and we had a great time. The staff there was really nice and friendly and very accommodating. The food and drinks were great. The atmosphere was awesome too, I mean it can't get better being at a driving range where everyone is drinking and having a good time. The bucket specials are pretty sweet (spent $20 for 6 leinenkugel sunset   wheat). If you go with a group it's easy to split the cost of things. Top gold offers various game options at the driving range that keep players amused. Overall I had a blast here and definitely would recommend this place to friends trying to do something different on the weekend or even during the week.

JJl0CfzhB9v1YUsdf78fIw.text: What a good time! Wasn't as pricey as I expected being in Scottsdale. The whole group shares hourly cost. Fun with a group. We had 8 and think it was perfect. I suggest come early, as we left about 730 or so there was a 1.5 hour wait! That might be a bit much. Food was good. Only suggestios are maybe give some guidance of how it all works, we had someone who has been there before but if we didn't might be confusing at first....also at main bar the woman tending wasn't very friendly and slow. But everyone else was so nice, maybe off day! Regardless I'll be back.

K7BcV7FOMY8odl1xAPBHRg.text: Had an awesome first time at AZ Top Golf. Big shoutout to Kat our server and Michelle her manager, who kept us very happy with food and drink while a swarm of different events were going on from Make a Wish In-progress to World Series Game 1. We had a minor glitch w one appetizer, but they did everything to make it right and then some! You can definitely trust the staff to take care of you. Would absolutely come back, and makes me wish Top Golf would come to the SF Bay Area!

HXINndTdM2dyOcIZOyMUcA.text: Horrible service! It took out group 40 minutes to get drinks and food. When ask the server said there was a mix up! They would come by and take our half full beer and take it away. They would say sorry and do it again. No management was around. This will be the last time I will come to this organization. Customer service is NOT a priority!   Thanks top golf for shitty service!!!

Wt1xaNn_IcpuvMo4dIvq6A.text: Very, very cool place!  With very, very expensive prices to go with it!  However, there is nothing else like it out there, so I guess they can charge what they want!  Just wish it was more reasonable for large families.  Make a reservation...the weekends are jammed pack!!!

fR7putt0LzPGvxPVXX9uYg.text: Great place for the family. Food and fun, what more can you ask for? Our group ordered the nachos, burgers, wings and drinks. Our server Sean was great!

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Swinging for white!

tFoS5crFZsWeqwBQhqao_g.text: I went the other night with a group of people. The service was awesome, even with that many people. Mac our service was funny and always making sure we were taken care of. It was a very fun place and will be back soon.

7lhP9JFJEFJZ1O3UxP9ymg.text: The scoring is automatic but not accurate. Didn't have much confidence in the assessment of my golf shot but it probably got it right 60% of the time. Not sure about the bar service because I didn't ask for that. Also, the ball release mechanism is a little frustrating since it requires a few waves of the club before it responds. I think 21st century technology can be better.

okOcpr-Ix0Bn4xijF6_-yQ.text: I had a great time there. The golfing was fun and challenging.  The food was excellent and I couldn't of asked for better service than I got from Mac on the first floor.

XbCswv37_6YM8kjfoi288A.text: Last night I had planned a bachelor party starting the evening off at Top Golf in Scottsdale (Riverwalk). I had all the guests get memberships on TopGolf.com to save some time. Upon arriving there was a line out the door. I expected it to be busy since they opened recently. Fletcher at the membership desk was EXTREMELY helpful getting all my friends their memberships cards. We then were helped by David at the main desk and asked if we could get two spots next to each other to accommodate our party of 8. I had heard that it can take over an hour to get a spot but within 30 minutes David had fit us in and got us started. The whole experience was amazing and we all had a great time. Even my friends that had no golfing experience had a blast. I will be returning very soon and can't wait to try the other games we didn't have time for. I feel like the longer they are open the smoother the whole process will become but will recommend TopGolf to everyone I know. Thank you for making it such a great experience!

7C4j1HhzvG9GqRbeBDmHEA.text: Love this place, I think it's my new addiction,  bloody marys with Mac, best waiter!!!

G0ts24E-E1wJ9Y5uGaHd5A.text: Golfing is fun service is poor. The waiter at bay 312 at 9pm on 10/14/14 (black visor and wannabe beard) needs to learn customer service. Our machine was down and instead of helping tried to push us to buy food. When we declined and asked if he could have someone fix our machine he gave us lip and walked off and didn't return for our next hour and a half. We paid good money to golf here ($45/he at night) and it's a shame to not even get anything from your waiter... Not even water. Golf was great though we didn't let the help ruin our night.

ft3eRxsPY0kYsNeDR3OuYA.text: Such a great time! Whether it's a work function or out with friends to let loose- you won't be disappointed! Amazing!

RhLxHjsD8V8TTwu-ClcJjA.text: Love it. Great with family and friends. Service and good good. Club selections is limited. Bringing your own is an option, but inconvenient.  They won't let woods or hybrids anymore. If you play golf, make sure your have a 6-8 iron with you. They may not.

s-I6XtqcSfYuHsIjnWauZQ.text: NOT A PLACE FOR KIDS! It seems the success has gotten to the folks at Top Golf. It started with a bad attitude at the sign in.  No friendly comments...just give me your name and wait.  Then they forced my 9 year old to put his driver and hybrid club back in the car...Sorry folks but he is 9 and can't hit the ball over your fence.  With only 2 other clubs in his bag we were unable to play.  Seriously, a 9 year old needs to avoid hitting his driver just in case he launches one over the fence.  This is common sense calling...is anyone home at Top Golf.

k0AxDXMCJ46xPHlz7QE9DQ.text: Couldn't have asked for anything better. Great for golfers and non golfers alike. Wish they had something like this when i was in highschool.

WwgJre1_1XpU6h0CO2Q7Wg.text: Apparently they are very busy even on a Tuesday night, I tried to call multiple times but the automatic recording kept on telling me that all staff members are busy, so I was kept on hold. Finally got fed up and had to email them to ask my question. I work as a ER nurse at a hospital a few miles away from Topgolf, and a few patients told me about it so I decided we would give it a try for my boyfriends birthday. One patient had told me that they do not allow you to bring in a birthday cake, unless you spend the extra money and plan an event. I figured this wasn't True.....since every restaurant, amusement park, bowling alley ect. I've ever been to lets you bring in birthday cakes.  The Topgolf website says no outside food or drinks, which I think it completely appropriate EXCEPT FOR BIRTHDAY CAKE/CUPCAKES! I received an email from Topgolfs Senior Events Coordinator Lauren Colvin, confirming that you are not allowed to bring birthday cakes ( I did not email her, what a coincidence the person that responded to my email is the person who books the events). I then called Topgolf again a few days later, and the lady who answered the phone said you can bring in your own birthday cake, if you pay the extra money to plan an event. I'm not sure if anyone has looked at the prices for events but they are expensive......and do not include alcohol. I sent out an Evite over a month ago, informing our friends and family that we are planning on going to TopGolf as walk-in guest and celebrating my boyfriends birthday. Last count there will be over thirty people, who are planning on eating, drinking, and playing golf. So now the dilemma is do I changed the party to somewhere more accommodating for birthdays entirely? Or go there and golf for an hour and then hold the celebration elsewhere where they allow you to actually personalize the birthday experience? This might not bother other people like it does me, but I do believe it is important fact to know before planning on celebrating your birthday at Topgolf.

RO3dHJ3h5GHFeeFbeAurVQ.text: Decided on a Monday morning to try Top Golf in Scottsdale.   They open at 9 am and don't take reservations.   I arrived at 10:30 am and was told there would be a 30 minute wait.   I asked why the wait since I could clearly see many empty bays.   I was told that they could not assign a bay unless there was wait staff available to provide beverage and food service.  I have never had this issue at other Top Golf locations and as a member, use Top Golf 1 to 2 times per week After discussions with several managers at increasing levels of responsibility I was finally assigned a bay.   Took about 20 minutes of complaining.   I love Top Golf but willl not go back to this facility.

RnS7n2fqCD6Q4y6o08vKKQ.text: My fiance recently held one of his bachelor party events at Top Golf. I wanted to send a few buckets of beer as a gift to him and his friends, and worked with Alishia who was absolutely amazing. She was extremely friendly and professional and totally made the day. Thank you again!

B0DbcypNrhKWCj5qW6CR1A.text: Normally I'd rate this place very high, but the ball tracking system is complete garbage the last 4 trips here. At least 50% of the really good shots (close to pin, back stop) never count despite us watching the ball clearly land well within range of points.  Hard to want to come back...

mfGuEWqVc2HCzCYmOHkmeg.text: Everything was overpriced and mediocre tasting. Make sure you make reservations, otherwise end up waiting hours to get a bay. You are better off going to play mini golf, or going to an actual golf course. Service was below average from the staff. Our server at our bay semi yelled at us to give him all our cards, then must have seen the look on my face and changed his tone.

C9HfN474y3K2DBIejn15yA.text: The experience started out great with Pete N. walking us to our bay and helping us get set up. He was very friendly and knowledgeable about all of the games available. Service was okay, nothing spectacular but just right. And then it came to the end of our time, we decided to not add more as we had other plans. We still had five minutes left and a large group was walked up to our bay and the employee stated loudly "they have 307 and 308." This created a very awkward experience for all involved as we still had time on our game as well as food and drink to finish. The group then just stood there and hovered over us waiting for us to finish. There were at least 8 bays around us empty that were next to each other that they could've been sat at. Our server started to rush us by trying to clear plates that still had food on them and then told us "there's a reservation waiting for this bay" like we were unaware. Very uncomfortable and unprofessional situation that was completely avoidable.

byxg6eA-6gRbjwnORCmtvw.text: f I could give zero I would! I called to book a reservation for 10. I couldn't book unless there were 12 of us. So, we arrive....2 hour wait!  But, we can get in right away if we go online and pay $50. So, I go online and the lady punches in the numbers I need...nope, won't work. So, she asks the manager, she enters a different number...nope, doesn't work. We offer to pay $50 cash...nope! The last time we were there our tab was $400+ with 6 of us! Imagine 10 of us. Unbelievable! I've been there several times and will NEVER GO BACK! UNBELIEVABLE!

Q2pTaBN0aU2jHlxR9GcUQw.text: 04.06.17 Update:  I received a prompt response to my Yelp review from Trisha Smith who sincerely wanted to make this situation right.  Trisha listened, acknowledged and resolved the issue by offering me choices.  This is the way to exceed customer expectations when a problem is presented.  Thanks Trisha!

Pfd_v5EdpnSres27FYtOfQ.text: Had a blast and the staff was amazing. Thank you Nichelle and Brittany you truly are OG Gangsters! We will see you again soon! Cheers!

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

3JvMyDvq3BNBpcp50jm-Dw.text: Awesome staff. We celebrated my husband's birthday here and can't say enough wonderful things about the staff, facility and food. Everything was perfect but above all the service we received was outstanding. It began from the initial phone call, we were working with Dulia who helped plan the event. My husband who had recently undergone surgery was not feeling well the day we had first selected for our event. I had to call Dulia the morning of the event to see if it would be possible to reschedule. She was so kind and understanding and was able to move our event to the following weekend. When we arrived to the event we were assigned to Mary Kate who did an outstanding job of getting us set up, drinks and food. She was wonderful and couldn't have done a better job not to mention how sweet she was to work with. The Manager came by to introduce himself and to make sure everything was going well. We also met the Events Coordinator who made a point to stop by. If your looking for a great place to have a celebration this TopGolf location is a great place. We are definitely going again.

tjMHh6KZDJKdf-s-y0UdRQ.text: Such a fun place!! I am not an avid golfer but this place is awesome, especially with a group of people to golf, eat & drink. We came this Sunday at 10AM for brunch with 6 people & it wasn't crowded at all, service was good, beers were $3 ea, & we got the queso which was yummy. The only reason I didn't give 5 starts is it is a bit pricey per hour of golfing, it can get up to $45/hour depending on when you go. That's why I always go with a group so you can split it a few ways.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

W9EqkiLowjghNG6sA00p1g.text: Spent our Father's Day with the whole family there  yesterday and beyond enjoyed our time!! Being in the service industry as well I had to take a moment and share that our server Kim was one of the best I've ever experienced!! Her personable personality and kindness didn't go unnoticed! Thanks again for such a nice day!

X-VpRCrTMwcrVfM5yfeF1A.text: The wait is not that bad just make sure you get here between opening and closing Monday to Sunday.  If anyone complains about the wait, that's the price you pay for a fun time at a hugely popular place like TopGolf.  I have played in Japan at the multi tier driving ranges. This is a league all its own.   The food is what you would expect. The quality of the golfer DOES NOT MATTER. TopGolf is the great equalizer. You come here to have fun or brag and show your skills or lack of, hahahaha.  Go and have a good time with friends and family. The more you have the better the time you will experience.   What a great time for team building events.  Office outings. A wonderful low pressure place where all players are great golfers.   Have fun we did.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. First level 34 driving positions 3 levels high.

DB-wKOhqFwdSkjjSXyigOg.text: Food, drinks, golf and REPEAT!!! I came here for a birthday gathering. I love how they did this place. Its so fun and it's great to bring friends and family, Especially a group of us. Great atmosphere and great service. Down stairs they have pool, and games on the tv. We had a blast!

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

NGUThj9imvyDulenNpOEdA.text: Had a great time, the wait was two hours but there were a lot of open bays, they could tighten that up and be more predictive, and service more customers, even tho they have lots to do while you wait.  FOOD, got the fried chicken sandwich, there was a middle bite that was very weird (maybe raw) about 4 hours later, I'm sending this from my towlet were I have, been for about 1:2 hour throwing up and ...... You know. Very sick!!!

5oxeZ75ytBzBmsV04_WGWw.text: Wow!!! What a place. Took the kids here after Easter Brunch and had a great time. Can get a little pricey if not careful.  It took me an extra order of doughnut holes to convince them to leave!

Uw4gI07acUlQieEyTBcvnQ.text: A little pricey after 5pm ($45 per hour) but it was fun. Not for actual driving range practice.  Probably be more fun for groups of non golfers just having fun.  Music was a little too loud for my taste. Very polite service and food was good.

B7LtsaJidERXTkNdeQbw4Q.text: LOVE this place. I am very pleased to hear that they will have one opening soon in Cali where I live. Best idea ever! Hit balls, compete with friends, and bar service. $50 an hour. Go with a big group! Clubs etc are provided for you.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. So fun!

0DuCGWVqQpjxx_pSB7Z8eA.text: Simply the most fun! Anyone can play great service and pub grub food hits the spot! People of all ages and skill can play. Don't need your own clubs. I hate playing golf at a course takes up the entire day. This is fun!!!!

skXT7TVBs_F7HFDuUZ2B8Q.text: I'm really impressed by this awesome venue! I'm from Cali... I've never seen such a unique place to hangout, eat, drink and play golf ! The set up is amazing, feels like ur in a sky deck. I enjoyed being here, I would totally look forward to homing again on my next visit!

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Playin golf ... ;)~

bdxAB1bVS6th8cmgKZbtmg.text: As a previous restaurant manager..I appreciate amazing service it's very hard now a days to get good 100% service..Our server *KAT*made our stay at TopGolf so amazing we all can't wait to go back I highly recommend her as a server.....now let's get to the food recommendations....for appetizers.cheese fries are a must order..wings are always amazing here.The nacho taste amazing but not big enough for a group but for a couple 2,its a good starter I just wish there was more they're small size but bomb a bigger guy or bigger girl would be disappointed but when they taste them they will love them lol....I ordered chicken waffles sandwich sooo good the chicken cooked to perfection not too crispy not too soft just right I would definitely order that again also ordered The Mac daddy burger which is a mac N cheese style burger if you love macNcheese you'll love this burger very good and filling. When you golf I recommend the second floor in the middle cause it's not to high not to low just right and the bar is right behind you too ....all around service from the moment you walk up everyone is very professional very helpfully if you need anything or have any questions anyone will help you NOT brush you off or be rude so I will definitely be back and recommend TopGolf to everyone I know this will be a weekly stop for me and my friends  cause of the amazing service and good food thank you TopGolf .If you see my other reviews it's very hard for me to give a 5 stars and i am very picky on food because I was a restaurant manager so I know how the kitchen and food and services and bar should be and you guys are top quality all around ...thank you server KAT ...because of you we will be back weekend and we will be requesting you as our server ever time if your there .....

Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac Daddy burgers. ....

qf7CRdnoJrk08MNiLsyryw.text: Soo much fun! I'm not a golfer at all but our bay hostess Hailey B was amazing and explained each game to us and even how to hold the club so we looked like we knew what we were doing. She went above and beyond and I would highly recommend requesting her, she made things so much fun and was super nice! :)

ayl8PPx-3tdHNUK_CDyUlg.text: I've been to another top golf in the Chicagoland area and this scottsdale location is head and shoulders better. They said before this location they turned old driving ranges into top golfs but they built this one from the ground up. Ppl go just to hangout and not even play. Wait times can be 2.5 hrs on the wkends.
