Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

g1GHGq5wkKVnQMTpinpIgQ.text: Was there at a golf event yesterday Nov 10th they were serving meatballs chicken fingers pork crab cakes I had the pork the chicken tenders and meatballs and got food poisoning verified by my doctor today..... I will never eat here again

Xb9RkyYdqZ6CNRjLbqyTZw.text: First time visiting top golf, and also first time golfing in my life! Didn't know what I was getting myself into but every employee was helpful and very nice. Taryn the bartender was awesome and really made me and my friends feel welcome.   We ordered drinks, the turkey avocado wrap with tater tots, burger with fries and for dessert the donut holes that you fill with chocolate, Bavarian cream, and raspberry. Everything was really awesome! Avocado was very fresh and the donuts were out of this world!   Top bays were definitely the best bet, will surely return for the service and fun times!   5/5

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Turkey avocado wrap and drinks!
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Donuts you fill yourself for dessert!
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Top bay, gorgeous view!

FKl8V3W9X1iT2I8YJDEkCw.text: I had never been to a driving range before. I have to say it was pretty fun and I liked how the machine kept score so you could play against your friends.   I am not a pro golfer by any means but we had a good time.   the waitress was super friendly... I would give her a shout out but do not recall her name, only that she attends ASU.... That really doesn't narrow it down much... Lol....  We stayed a couple hours and one thing I can say is it was not super cheap.... Still a good time.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. I just swing super hard and watch it fly... I could probably use someone to teach me a bit of skill but it&#39;s still fun....

A_6YkbturWJcipfQ0GeRYw.text: We decided to do away with just dining out on Valentine's day and try something different. Topgolf it was and we really enjoyed the experience - golf games, drinks, food and some good old fashion fun. I'm not much of a golfer but really enjoyed my time. Will definitely be back to a TG near you.

LFDkql3a-rUFQi0pph7cjQ.text: Too busy on a Saturday...I used to go to clubs in Scottsdale when I went to ASU a long time ago. Not only will will this give you some awesome drinks and areas to drink it in, you can take you aggressions out on some balls in the meantime!   We came here on a Saturday at 730 during spring training and if you do the same just plan on drinking 3 hours before you get your spot to hit balls! When you do you'll find the place you love to hit when it comes to lighted targets and a computer that shows you the way that you hit. Enjoy that!   As far as the people, awesome. Just plain awesome. You don't have to be ready to club, you just have to be ready to talk. Lots of hot singles here, get ready to go. I met a lot of hot girls here! Enjoy your time!

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Too busy to get on the range!
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The wait was 3 hours for hitting balls so you have to drink
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

d14SMOmjvybgJgDaMYL1NA.text: We are here for the Thanksgiving holiday and this is our third time here. We have had many awesome experiences every time.  Today we had Alexis and she was on point. All our food came out in a timely manner "shout out to the Kitchen" since they were extremely busy.  We will definitely be back again, if not another time before heading back to the East Coast.

BrIjbKfKpumf8XYhoNGh_Q.text: First time to Top Golf and was a lot of fun. We were in a group and had a variety of golf abilities but it didn't matter as it's set up for Everyone to have fun. Great for team building, family fun, stags,birthday parties etc... as there are a variety of games that can suit your abilities. Food was good but not spectacular but the golf pro(Taylor) was super helpful to the non golfers as well as the True golfers. Certainly a great place to have some fun for golfers and non golfers !!

4QAjoERz_B68uLdFuCnlgg.text: What a fun, but expensive way to spend an afternoon!  Our group of four reserved a bay for 3 hours and played multiple games as well as enjoyed some tasty food and drinks.  I had the Angry Orchard rose cider (yum) and we shared the grilled chicken sandwich with tots, the bao bun tacos with brisket and the pretzel bites with mustard and cheese.  Each bay is also outfitted with a TV, so you can watch whatever sports are on at that time - NBA playoffs for us!  We'll definitely be back for some more fun with friends!

PTMme1r3fvBtLjzX-MwI7w.text: Always a great time here.  Great for kids (just ask to be on the first level so no one falls over board).  Fairly priced at $25 per hour.  The food is surprisingly amazing too!  Five stars all the way!

NruSBvNE4rlnMZXPyQZjwg.text: Topgolf allows people to make reservations. I suggest you make one online otherwise you will be waiting for an hour. I had a party of 5 with a 4pm reservation and we only waiting 5 mins at the bar. Every single staff member that we encountered was extremely friendly and took very good care of us. We were escorted up to our bay. We were served by our waitress Lauren. We played for a full hour while enjoying food and drinks. The prices are fairly reasonable. Top golf is perfect for a family outing or even a fun date. The environment is very lively and has music playing in the background. You can dress comfortable as the attire is casual.  I highly recommend top golf to anyone that wants to have a good time and try something new. By the way, you do not have to be a pro golfer to have fun.

9ldlWtS3HutLBs_7zrCRmA.text: Had a birthday here. Great time and awesome service. They go above and beyond to ensure you and your guests are taken care of. Will definitely go again and recommend to others!

qlabsbLh_8ix1fcIHCekJA.text: Went here as a work outing and had a ton of fun! I'm not even a golfer and couldn't stop smiling! The 40oz burger was insane!

XQ8RAMMEmWB2uqxLfpdE6w.text: Wow! What a blast! Great service, amazing good, and decently priced booze! So much fun for you and your friends. I can't wait for my family to visit so I can show them this gem! The manager, Cory tending to us was so accommodating and helpful! Thanks for such a great night guys. I highly recommend checking this place out, just get their early evening so you can avoid the wait!

EyFWesMpGMvMP_Y6g6PpTA.text: Facilities have been completely let go. Food quality is terrible. Staff is extraordinarily rude and unhelpful. My advice - go the extra twenty minutes to the Gilbert facility to be treated well and have a good experience.

RuFHoddYTxa0n27dFNJj-g.text: Cool place.  Food is pretty darn good, as well.  I'll definitely be back and I plan on using this as a place to host business meetings.

4zFBPoyzZaAEKReQcYoGCQ.text: This place was great! Love that they finally opened one in Arizona. All the employees were extremely nice and friendly and on top of their customer service. Everything is fairly reasonably priced for Scottsdale. I will definitely be back for more games!

HFdPQgfM7vkx53NQEyqdrQ.text: 10 stars, super fun!! We have been maybe 5 times all for different events. Birthday parties, work meetings, family gathering, couples date night and everytime we have more fun. No complaints. The food it awesome too!

tHW1IL2wcKvCJuoku_RnPA.text: Normally in the past I've had great experiences but after my visit today at the restaurant/bar I was very disappointed with the service. The bartender was very rude and unpleasant.

dtxa79SVtvXNMmoP4sZPhg.text: Went here with some friends had a great time. I would recommend this for an evening out.

-DK237ub8rSCqR2qyAT8dg.text: We have had a lot of fun here with friends.  This place is huge and waiting to get a bay is typically at a minimum.  Not too pricey if you have a few people chip in.  Drinks are kind of expensive at the bar.  Fun place to spend a few hours or an evening.

Uig2rx2-1URkRXlPV4iZjQ.text: THIS PLACE IS FUN! Even if you dont know how to golf. The only downside is how long the wait is so be sure to plan for that if you go on a weekend. We got our name down and then went over the to the casino until they called us. The donut holes are delicious!

mUfuXf54c2uV87w2bg53jw.text: Top Golf where you spend a lot of money, that should be a slogan for them. Top Golf is nice it's close to everything you want like talking stick or even old town Scottsdale. This area is a fun and a growing area and you will have fun coming here if you have a good group of people. Friday-Sunday night there will always be wait times sometimes even to an hour which is expectable because it always happens with how buys this place is. If it's your first time you have to get a card that's 5$ but you get to keep it forever. You go to your bay or section and you slide the card into the machine and each player has to do that. It's basically like bowling. After that you select how long you want to play so 30 minutes to an hour to two hours it's on whatever you guys want but obviously more time more money. One hour is 45$ so you have to split that with your group. I've came her a couple of times over the year and the menu changed this last time I was there with new products and taking some things off. I ordered the Bacon and Cheese roll and they were out... The biggest picture on the appetizer page and they didn't have and the girl suggested it. I ordered chips and guacamole and they give you so much chips and barley any Guacamole or salads. Why?? Because they want you to order more obviously more $$$ but if you know good guacamole you won't be ordering more because it's tasteless and lacks flavor. Also my friends ordered the same and mine came out 5 minutes after.. Didn't really make any sense. I also ordered the quesadilla and it was gross they put so much peppers and no cheese at all for the price it truly sucks.. Don't get the peppers in it maybe it will be better. Another mistake they made where my food just came out late but we all ordered the same thing.. Like my friend got the same order and my quesadilla just didn't wanna come. I guess the girl forgot it so I reformed her and she said she'll go check after about 10 minutes I ask her again she replies with "it's only been 7 minutes" what kind of customer service is that??? Shouldn't I get "oh I'm sorry it will be out soon" just give me some BS don't reply with how longs it's been like it hasn't been long at all. Service is just terrible. The food all has no taste and had a big price.. So food sucks and you get a golfing experience but you can't smoke or vape. This place could be 100 times better if they knew what they were doing. It's fun but nothin

2goZDpEII3AvXNvRCVpCPQ.text: This place was so fun for my kids!!! I will totally go back in my next visit. The food was just ok but the atmosphere blew me away. They even had an Xbox connect downstairs that the kids could play with while we waited for our table.

AQknrKwjb_ncp8piRe8bLQ.text: Way over priced!! Rude employees!! Not worth the value. So complicated to get started.

0piVpJhPU_0HoSLFJfNOcg.text: TopGolf is pure genius.  I've been to two now and they are busy from the time they open.  $25 an hour for balls and $2 PBR's.  Done and done.

wFaLDSX2EINanTm7CZ5sDw.text: Super fun. Awesome location right off 101 with beautiful view of mountains and right next to Talking Stick. Perfect for anyone. Friendly service and great for anyone of any golf level.

8fWwnNNWUIOWK4DKSwjBow.text: First time here and we had a great time, many games to chose from and the golf was fun. Had the burgers,  sweet potatoe frys. Food good I think the drink were a little weak. That would be the bad thing.

ny4eeYNfWSF1wP9buuGbrg.text: This is a bar, not a practice range per se. They don't let you use your own drivers, woods, and won't let you take your golf bag with you. I felt really uncomfortable hitting the ball from second floor, feels like you will fall down or drop the club. You have to become a member to practice there, comes with a $5 additional fee. Oh, they also take your phone number (mandatory), and start sending ads via sms.  Bunch of rules, policies etc.

WBrDiX-iTsSBQ7x65Ar9Vw.text: Always A GOOD Time There. But Let Me Talk About The Food "YOU WANT FLAVOR IT IS ALL THERE!" Awesome Environment Awesome Staff. I Highly Recommend!

w7RywHaavELle7qjild07w.text: As a corporate event planner, Topgolf is great. The facilities are set up perfectly to mix business with pleasure. The meetings spaces are always spacious, well lit, and already equipped to display presentations with A/V. I am disappointed with this Topgolf in particular for not looking carefully for our event materials we shipped there for an event. We were told one of our boxes hadn't arrived after assuring them that it had according to FedEx. After the fact, our box was discovered to have arrived on time. Although I am not opposed to hosting more events at Topgolf locations, my piece of feedback for management is to hire detail-oriented employees  to minimize careless mistakes.

EvgPVFev49cQEBDU0KaQaQ.text: Me and a bunch of friends just went to Top Golf and had a blast. The prices are affordable and our server Brett gave awesome service. Definitely a place to bring your friends from out of town.

iYZvt4-5-6pyLpF-ADdDUw.text: 5 stars on concept alone! Excited this came to Scottsdale! Was so excited to go! A good friend birthday was finally an excuse. Sad she had to come down early to put her name in and then was bumped. ( No calling ahead to reserve) Good thing she is super laid back. Weird they didn't comp anything for her. There is a huge bar when you enter which help aid the wait and then bumping her out of wait list. Back drop ( have a photo shoot if like) to feel like you are a celeb! Ha! Reminded me of bowling but so much cooler. Pay $5 to get membership card. Then rent bay ( think lane if you were bowling) by the hour. Good music, misters and the servers bring you drinks. A few times got a tab before a drink which was odd. Had to also visit the bar if you are super thirsty...I am no golfer but can't wait to go back!

A2fFmUCuvt-mkk4ShuOYuQ.text: The food was great and the service was phenomenal. Specifically, Jill, JJ, Ashely, and Todd were professional, friendly, and easygoing bartenders. I highly recommend visiting this restaurant if you are staying at the Talking Sticks Resort or in the Scottsdale, AZ area.

28gffpEACEHJ9C1q9QmLdA.text: Horrible experience here. I called several times leading up to out get together and I was told there was no way to make a reservation - I had 14 people in my party. This was suppose to be a SURPRISE get together for my boyfriends 35th birthday. He LOVES topgolf- one of the friends in the party agreed to get there at 345 to put our name in. She had never been to topgolf before and no one explained to her the process. She put our name down and requested two bays around 345 and she was quoted 30 minutes. This was perfect because every one was arriving around 4. We waited until 455 to be sat. UNREAL. We went up to the counter several times to check on the status of our group and the girl kept telling us ten more minutes. Absolutely unacceptable - just be honest and quote and hour and 15. We had dinner reservations at 730 25 minutes away and didn't start golfing until 500. When we were sat, we were told to quickly start so that we could receive the $35 an hour rate instead of the $45. Super unpleasant experience. DO NOT COME HERE IF YOU HAVE A LARGE GROUP. It was a nightmare.

mp-NhzTfTxza-_AqL1XNLg.text: We went yesterday and had great time.  Me and a friend and our two 14 year old daughters.  Neither know how to golf but we had a blast.  Food was also very good with great service.

8cMC_LC5r1iXrF_UW7dBLw.text: Since I am no a golfer and was here for my uncle's birthday weekend, we ordered brunch. Luckily my wife shared her chicken and waffle since the kitchen NEVER delivers my eggs Benedict. After many reminders that I still did not get my meal we told the waiter not to bother. They were out of doughnuts so for the 3 items we ordered we got one. I guess baseball is not the only place by where .333 is a good record.

mp07TQV7runLkNAaU9ZdQw.text: Who doesn't like TopGolf! This was my first time experiencing the place and it was absolutely amazing! We went knowing it would be packed and we might have to wait but going on a Saturday night (7ish) is probably not the best idea if you want to play. The place was super packed, cars lined down the street, and a wait of 2 hours....I was somewhat discouraged but, like I said, I was expecting this. Since we were visiting out of town we left and it actually worked out to our benefit because I got a text offer of $10 off since we weren't able to play.  We went back the next morning and the place was empty and wonderful. The game is great for anyone, even for my first timer wife and friends. We were able to do our own make shift brunch with their kitchen open and serving anything on the menu. The air was a little cool and they turned on these heaters that were amazing! You stay warm even though your outdoors! The service could have been better, hence the 4 stars. Our waiter seemed apathetic about serving and wasn't really attentive, but then again I was there for the golf!

WXzen-bxV7MsMfEzvp0ulg.text: One of the servers was very rude she looks like a guy and has blond hair. When ordering she kept interrupting and saying what she would order. After finishing my food, one of the bussed boys tried to take my vape juice which luckily I caught because it was a $50 bottle.

QNm1XyUx1gyuh_B4mzaqKA.text: Fun activity but I will not be returning. Horrible service. First the bartender did not even greet us as we sat at the bar to wait for our bay, he seemed unenthused to say the least. The entire time he was chewing on a straw. Unprofessional. We ordered food and before it came out our bay was ready. One employee told us we can transfer our tab no problem and they can bring the food out to the bay, but the bartender forced us to wait and close out our tab while our food was outside sitting at our table. This was frustrating since we planned on ordering more drinks later. Then they gave us a bay that was on the 1st floor when we requested 2nd or 3rd but since our food was already there we just stayed. They were out of multiple food items and hefeweizen beer that we ordered one then had to switch. Also, the holes were not counting our points so we had to manually put them in every time. When you pay $45/hr that is just wasting your paid time. It seemed like a joke to be honest when you spend $70+ for one hour of activity. Not worth it!

ZoJUBdfj9oZe21-96XWxWw.text: Went to top golf for the second time and had a blast! I really like the atmosphere here and the staff is very friendly and the service is top notch. There are many different games to choose from, some are easy and others are more advanced. A great place for anyone to hang out even if you have never hit a golf ball before. They do not allow drivers at this place but you are welcome to bring your own irons if you wish. The music is loud enough to enjoy but not so loud that you have a hard time carrying on a conversation with your team mates. The hourly rates are a bit pricy but I think it is worth the service and nice facility that comes along with it. I will be returning to this location quite frequently.

m1Dx8PgGshXbvnQFU4Gs7A.text: The golfing was great and the atmosphere was great and fun and we will definitely be back for that. This review is specifically for one of the staff members. I was with a group of 6 (3 guys and 3 girls) and we were all sitting at the bar waiting for a bay to become available. The 3 guys had their drink orders taken and delivered within about 5 minutes. Another 15 minutes passed and the other 3 of us girls still hadn't even placed our order. So we asked the guys in our party if they knew we were all together and the bartender heard us and ran over and started yelling at us saying we were rude and impatient and that they were busy and just because we are pretty girls doesn't mean the world should be handed to us... I was shocked and didn't even know what to say and all the other customers at the bar were staring and laughing. It was SO embarrassing. So then he's asks "ok fine I'm here now, what do you want?" My friend orders a Bloody Mary and her charge was about $8 and change. Then about 20 minutes later a new (and nicer) bartender came around and she ordered a second Bloody Mary and her charge was $6 and change, so we asked and he said that's the normal charge so why was she overcharged for the first one? It wasn't worth asking to save us from an argument and more embarrassment. Unfortunately we did not get his name but he is a bald man, looks maybe Philippino, but I can't be sure. If you see this guy when you're there, don't waste your time.

jvXNcpvE5c5Te9B8uws_qA.text: This was our first visit to Top Golf and we are from Orange County.  We came on a busy Wednesday and it was the start of a huge rainstorm! At first our 3 girls ages 7, 8, and 10 were amused at the beautiful lightening! But then the lightening became the biggest rainstorm we had ever experienced! The rain was blowing on us, sand was getting into our eyes and food, and the girls became scared and wanted to leave asap! Michelle, the team shift leader, was so amazing with us and the girls! She credited our stay at Top Golf and invited us to come back the next night so we could have a better experience.  We came back the next night, she greeted us with a big smile and took care of us.  We had the absolute best time, the night was beautiful and we would definitely highly recommend anyone to come here for a fun and different golf experience. Thank you again Michelle for the fantastic customer service!

uVh3ynLBgqKNdMEcvSEt1A.text: We went to Topgolf to celebrate my daughter's 19th birthday. This was our first time going to Topgolf so we had no clue what to expect. However, everyone was super helpful and very friendly. My daughter had on a "It's My Birthday" Sash, so every employee who saw her came over to wish her a Happy Birthday. Her, her best friend, and a manager even did the "Wobble" when the song came on. Jenny took us to our bay and explained the game to us, she was super sweet. Michelle checked in on us all night to make sure our birthday girl was having a blast and at the end of the night she made sure we had a family picture. Dan, our waiter while we were in our bay, was absolutely amazing! He continually checked in on us and was super attentive to the birthday girl. He was even kind enough to take a picture with her and her best friend. He is a total doll and an amazing young man! Peggy Sue started us off right while we were waiting for our bay. The employees made sure to talk with each of us at the table (including my son and aunt) and even encouraged my son to apply and come to an interview next week. Thanks Topgolf for making our experience such a great one!

JVy6HCJBXZQ4F9R1QxCV8Q.text: I gotta admit, Its nice having somewhere fun to go to on those nights when you just don't wanna do the same old bar scene anymore. You can only play big buck hunter so many times before you want to smash the screen in with that plastic gun. I'll get you one day you big buck....ahem...but I digress....The golfing games are very fun and even those who have never golfed in their lives would be welcomed here. Great spot to just hang out for a few hours and hvae some drinks with friends while making a fool out of yourself. You can either really impress your friends or completely leave them in stitches all based off your golf swing. Keep that in mind fellas if you are bringing a girl you want to impress. Drinks are strong, food is good, atmosphere is nice. Lost a star because of long long lines and a little bit of incompetence encountered with concierge, but besides that cool spot.

qzyTU60d2Oil9y0EfOQIFA.text: Fun, relaxing, drinks, food, games and a gorgeous view!! Try a Bloody Mary and add your own toppings!

-MF9rg2JEoxB_WvY15IZaQ.text: Tried this place after my sister told me about it. It was a pretty great place. A bit pricey depending on when you go and if you go with alone or just with another, but with enough people it's quite cheap and very reasonable. The only reason it's three stars is that the golf clubs that they provide have very wore out handles. We are not asking for a high line golf club or have the handles be replaces if there is a nix, but they were really wore and made it uncomfortavle to grip. Also, not all of the bays are a great location. The best is tight in the middle, we were placed on the edge and was easy to have the ball get caught in the net if it hooked without any chance to fall into one of the holes at all. We were also there for about an hour, so we didn't get any food or drinks so not sure if it was good or worth the price. Will need to revisit the place again in the future, hope they will have some in the LA area in the near future. I would still recommend this place for people to visit. I also need to visit this place at night because their range glows at night, or so I've been told.

h0f8-9c7MqOAG8PYrMv43A.text: HOLEY moley this place was rockin. I can't believe how packed it was it was literally shoulder to shoulder everywhere. The parking lot was as full as any mall during the holidays. Driving around and around trying to find a spot and finally giving up and using the valet. It was a Saturday so I'm guessing it was part of the reason and because it's still so unique. But we were on the wait list to play for two hours and finally left. We are while we waited and the food was good.

QuyWi0r_RjDpobi8WIncAA.text: I always have fun when I come here. I am by no means a golfer but the games are fun. My bf loves to golf. He has a great time and even with my lack of golf game I have a good time. However the service we received last night was awful. It took at least 10-15 mins for our server to get to us. We had already finished one game. We ordered one round. Sat with empty drinks for a bit. So we decided to get a pitcher so we wouldn't be left wanting. It came with a chipped glass. Had to walk around to find someone to fix that. It was replaced quickly. Then it came time to pay our tab. Our games we finished our time was up. Had to track down our server. I like to pay with cash. While I am taking out my money, haven't even put it down yet the server asked if I needed change. Rude. We probably would have eaten too but we were never asked if we would like anything and our server was nowhere to be seen. Five stars for fun. Zero stars for service. I left with a sour taste in my mouth. Train your servers better. I will not be choosing to spend my money here again.

zg2cyr2msQGp0ImdfJIeqA.text: This was my first time here. Chelsey and Bambi and Ashley made this the most amazing time. I will be back and will bring my friends for happy hour and some golf!!

YQ7ByAZjTDf8Bx7qm2AiUg.text: Way too much fun.  Drinks, couches and hitting golf balls.  Seriously.  Service awesome and experience awesome.

rMGVSMpGrCfLanpsx0DV1A.text: Had a great time golfing...good for amateurs as well. Don't bother downloading the app. (Needed to change the channel) 3 of us tried and none of us could log in. Other than that, everyone enjoyed themselves.

QDyDV0ZVk-xdX6f2kfoLNA.text: Love this place....tons of fun.  Pretty disappointed that no woods or drivers are allowed.  I'm hoping they get that problem corrected at some point.  Otherwise, thisis a fun place to play.

r9BhF3jKSzABCVlNP9cw1w.text: We had a tough time when we first got there but the manager Sean made up for it. He bumped us up on the list as much as he could, and our server Tim was incredible. I had a wonderful birthday celebration!

oeLMuzoqy6rC3N5G0vzg0w.text: Why in the world had I not heard of this place before?  What a great idea! You walk right up and someone is there to greet you before you even get in the door.  We get directed inside and are explained the different options for fun.  We chose the one hour deal, with four $5 memberships.  We get going with our little competition and are having a blast.  There are different targets to accumulate points.  Very user friendly.  Plus, we get service from a "waiter/waitress," for lack of a better word.  The choice of golf clubs wasn't the greatest, but it did the job.  We had a great time for less than 100 bucks split four ways.  Plus, it is just across the way from the casino.  Good time for all.  I am returning when back in the area and am bringing friends!

NIeQmsZgLoQqYfKxGfn_QA.text: I like top golf. It's fun. I first learned of it in Austin Texas. Only wish they had more options on the menu to chose from but overall not a bad place to spend some time with family from out of town. Not Enticing enough to go more often. I'd only go once a year.

BdK7B-f_s0A8RjGW6LIFEA.text: It's my first time trying this golf thing. My husband told me how to stand and hit the ball, but that didn't work so well. I got the hang of it towards the end and even had the high score at the end. This place is fun with night golf as well, we did the afternoon and it was really fun with service and lunch from the top golf team. Definitely will be coming back here.

_qgO8UP0JVX0j5g6DOGtgA.text: I loved this place. Finally good food and fun! The spinach salad was perfect. Hubby had club sandwich. I expected bowling food but was totally surprise with the high quality of food. The goat cheese with cinnamon Mouth watering. I loved the golf game easy to play with good golfers and hackers as well. Wives take husbands here for date night

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Fun day with hubby date night!
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Club sandwich

Va2_qBR8p9yYK05rxI0Ofg.text: Fun game, kind of pricey but die hard probably love it.  However, the food and drink service was horrible. They forgot to put in our food order and the staff argued afterwards. They apologized and recognized their error, however I asked for a drink refill at 430, it's 505 and I never got it. You think after they screwed up on food, they would pay more attention. You can build a nice place and have beautiful amenities, however if you don't hire the right person they can mess it all up.

aC8bhTJu6MWd2Vr6m8vb0g.text: Great time! Love the chicken and waffles! The fish bowl drinks get you absolutely tanked ! I have never been able to drive out of here always have to drink a fish bowl ! The clubs are nice. I love there balls.  There balls are Stuffed with a GPS. You know exactly where the balls go

nV-ibU3ERipibJOSzKshqg.text: Amazing! I'm not a golfer, but I ended up loving it. I went with my family who loves golf and we planned on staying an hour since I don't golf. Over 6 hours later and we left only because we had a far drive. This place has it all down right. The food is amazing. I didn't expect it to be so good. The brisket tacos and chorizo sliders are my favorite.  Good quality food and so many unique items. I highly recommend this place for people of all ages. My teens loved it. The bays are nice and roomy.  There was 7 of us and each bay can have up to 10 people. You must try it. We will be back again soon.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Injectable donuts. The raspberry is amazing.
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Long island golf bowl
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Sunrise burger

z1Jl0VEKWfEVlS06gQvtqg.text: Pleased to be nearby such a fun place to get away enjoy great food, entertainment, and meet new friends!

nJCGYhZnRfAdbqI74uJMyw.text: Went to TopGolf for a work off-site and this place is unreal! Had SUCH a great time!  The only downside is the parking lot. Seriously, parking is a nightmare! There's SO much space out there in the desert, you'd think they'd be able to buy some property to put in a larger parking lot.  Check this place out, but either get there early, or pay the $6 valet fee - it's worth it when it's a million+ degrees out, 'cause you're gonna be walking!  ProTip - you get a free dessert if it's your birthday! Oh, and make sure you have a reservation!

TY8n5Lo6Qp-fnmW-oh3bsw.text: For non-golfer this is really fun! We had the top floor I would recommend this level. I waited rylan was friendly and awesome! The food is ok but they have a full bar which makes up for it ! This place is a lot of fun!

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. My hubby getting the hang of it

J7z3lwi3zuENboqEewQMjg.text: Everytime I come here the wait is wayyy too long and we end up leaving. This place is overrated so stupid. I got "too drunk" and got kicked out. Now im stuck on an indian reservation. Awesome.

cP8XOyloAEwBFRnz8xluGQ.text: Absolutely love this place. It was the perfect place to relax after the reception dinner before my friends wedding. Trey really took care of us!! Love you guys.

nX9skIE_r774NS4HlbBFrw.text: Always a good time at Top Golf! Always worth the wait. The food and drinks are always awesome and the overall experience is so much fun!

44ceJUgtP4QiNLimXbDyzw.text: This place is the beez kneez! I am from Dallas so I used to go to the original all the time. Obviously like any business they learn as they grow. The one I went too didn't have lounge seating, didn't have free clubs at the bays and wasn't three stories. They get better every time! Kids love it, girls love it, everyone loves it. You have to check it out rather you golf or not.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

WugI3ANzrHUOQUNVBCJLPg.text: Love coming to topgolf. Great service, helpful staff, and lots of fun. They even have a free shuttle to Talking Stick Resort which helps when the wait is long. Trey (our shuttle driver) was exceptional and gave us the inside scoop on good deals going at topgolf and how to use the shuttle. Always a great time!

4gQg2s25VO5FsJVdHpGVYQ.text: I am stretched to even give this a single star but must say the good was excellent. No golf, though. We drove an hour to get to TopGolf - pumped and ready to go. Showed up at 5:30. Told it was a 2 hour wait. At 8:00 we were told we were #18 on the list and it would be another hour. All due to the fact that they had two special event parties that had basically bought out the place. Why in the world would they sell out the place on a Saturday night? Bad management decision. My recommendation - start taking reservations! I would have paid double to play even for an hour.

4ZXAuAogoQfbK_CuRSie_Q.text: Very. Very. Bad management. Spent hundreds of dollars at this location to be treated poorly by a "manager". Definitely will not be coming back

YFqdu48K0heIMG8KWIXW8A.text: Extremely rude staff, if you're a serious golfer go ahead and skip this one. The place is crowded, there's never enough room to sit at the bar and wait for your bay. Security and waitstaff were rude, management didn't seem to care. Do yourself a favor and wipe this off your list for golf spots in Scottsdale

FVcTvBk3BmYOSK-7VWQvsg.text: Love the concept and great atmosphere. Showed up last week at 5pm and already had a 2- hour wait. Great bar and tv's to pass the time. Only complaint was our waiter could not handle the bay's he was responsible for. Waited awhile for food and drinks. One time we just went to the bar directly to get drinks.   Cool concept though we will be back.

vpXBiN-sAqW6v3DdeQZa0g.text: Worst experience ever!  I wish they had negative stars.  I came on a Friday afternoon.  We needed to reprint our cards because we had lost them, no problem..  In order to put our name in for a reservation we had to have the cards.  So we waited in the "express" reprint line for 30 minutes only to have a group of 15 guys be brought in front of us to have their cards reprinted.   There were only 2 of us and we had been waiting for 30 minutes already!  The group claimed they knew "chris" whoever the heck Chris is should figure out a better way to manage this place.  We stood and waited another 30 before leaving because we were so frustrated.   The place is so unorganized and dysfunctional I couldn't believe people could tolerate being there.   The lobby was a madhouse and the kids running the place had no idea what was going on.  I've been to topgolf before and thought it was fun, but I will never ever go back to this cage full of monkeys.  Get your sh*t together.

H2VS2ypHzaZaomPFmMTeKA.text: This place sucks. Food took forever and it was wrong twice, the heaters are broken in the"on" position, in gd Arizona!! Service for drinks took about 25 minutes for each drink. First time coming will, not come back.

xPeo15xhaUg7Xp0TeDqhgw.text: I will admit the first time I was told I was going to Top Golf I wasn't very excited. I am not a golfer and don't usually enjoy sport themed evenings. I rejoiced when our birthday party of 12 called for a reservation and was told it was a 3 hour wait.   The second time I was told I was going to Top Gold I knew I wasn't getting out of it. We were going for a corporate team builder and had about 25 people in our group. Once we arrived I was amazed at the size of the place and that it was packed full on a Tuesday night. There are 3 stories of bays (private couch areas that fit about 6 people). The bays come stocked with both male and female clubs and a screen similar to a bowling set up where you can enter in your names and select the games you want to play.  I will admit when I am wrong, I had a blast! The service was awesome, we had someone come over and explain how to play and we quickly ordered cocktails and got started. The server kept everyone on a separate tab which made paying the bill at the end of the night a breeze.  The food was not bad, we did buffet style fajitas with rice and beans. It wasn't the most flavorful but pretty decent for a buffet and the focus here isn't really on the food.   I didn't score the highest but I had a fun time trying. Even if you are not a golf fan I would recommend this as a fun outing for large groups.

C009EZ8Sfc_85hEz9lUsnQ.text: Topgolf is super unaccommodating. I'm trying to reserve bays for a graduation get together and I have gotten different responses from each person I have talked to. If you have a group larger than 8 it's not worth your time to try and work with them on reservations.

uCBsYLv01tf1SuYTBwh6KA.text: First time at TopGolf, staff was very good at making us feel welcome and understand how it worked.  Was able to get a bay very quickly and on the 3rd floor which was cool.  Angelo, our server, was AWESOME - helped with drink selection , food choices, and overall just super cool and we never felt rushed.  The watermelon margaritas were great as was the strawberry jalapeno margarita.  Nachos were great with red and green jalapenos , very very tasty.  Had a blast, can't wait to go to another one sometime.

CFRWzqDwoLeMehi7RZWH0Q.text: Super fun golf-ish spot with drinks and decent food!!  Date day for the hubs and I so we stop here for an hour to hit some golf balls.  You can choose different games & you pay for an hourly game play.  The cazadores margarita was decent though I did ask for no salt... Which it did arrive with salt.  We shared the chicken nachos and 2 buffalo chicken sliders.  The food was very decent but next time I said let's order when were almost finished.    Nice friendly staff here willing to go out of their way to make a customer happy.

YtSkq2K2S5sIpRjhrfTjeg.text: Called in ahead of time. Number is for their "corporate office".  Asked how long the wait was, couldn't give me an estimate. Drive 30 minutes to the location and are told it's a three hour wait. Pathetic customer service, no apology, a bunch of excuses

R-sPzfd16Hdswr38-dex_A.text: A great concept. Golf thats not intimidating-- why didn't o think of This! Golf is fun, food is good, And the atmosphere is right. I especially like that they have plenty of cooling for this hot summer days.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Fans and misters everywhete

ITpYkeYhi24JzMwz1WVSyw.text: I really like this place but what a mess. We spent more than 20 mins trying to register and the computer screen wasnt working. They tried to use that time towards our one hour of play time. We had to get manager to fix the time after we complained and asked twice.    We bought 2 hours and you are busy! You pay by  the hour but the second your time is up they want you to take food and drinks out of yout bay to another spot. It was not full and there were more 20 bays in our area empty but they were forcing us out of the bay. And making a big deal about it.  Its unfair to not let us finish the stuff we ordered which is already pretty pricey.

jYCaIGoqih_2bEkrPti1vA.text: Although the price is not the cheapest, the food and service is incredible. Even if you're not good at golf it's a spectacular time and everyone has a blast.   And the price, although high, it's amazing.   Recommend.

almiY-DnyE4vigkQQj4p9A.text: Tess J is absolutely amazing in every way. She was so kind, caring and attentive to our table all night making it a great experience. If you are able to get Tess as your server, consider yourself lucky!

Wg83oVn8FfvBhWEbz6C_DQ.text: 2nd one I've been to. Love the concept, and the staff is clearly well motivated. Always friendly and helpful. Clean and new looking facility. Food was good, only comment would be to be more clear about a (ridiculous) $5 up charge for woodford vs bulleit. That ticked me off but otherwise, great experience

bYfbYMjx0flEtzbZkkfziw.text: Do yourself a favor and register for the $5 lifetime membership beforehand. Depending on what time you go, it may save you some waiting time. myaccount.topgolf.com/ch... Select the "Riverwalk" location and fill out the information. Type in $0 if you just want the $5 membership when you reach the page for additional add-ons. When everything is completed, you will receive 2 emails. One of which will have a code that they will scan to make your card. We went on a Saturday night and it took us 2 hours to get a bay. They will text you so keep a close eye on your phone. It would also be a good idea to carpool if you are going at a peak time...although I'm sure this will not be a problem once the novelty has worn off. Overall it was a fun experience but it would be nice if the entire process was more organized or at least better displayed to avoid confusion. The drinks were meh but I guess that's pretty typical of a sports bar. Its a great place to go if you want a change from Old Town Scottsdale. And, as I mentioned to my single girlfriend, its an awesome place to meet men! ;)

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Strawberry mint sangria, white peach sangria and a Sam Adams seasonal
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

yqyQ8yUK6nLFMtXerU3a5g.text: I didn't realize it was opening week. Came here prime time, Saturday night at 730pm. Line was out the door and it was about 25 minutes, and it was just to get a membership card. The line died down a lot later, but I had to wait because I needed the membership card so I could go to concierge in order to put my name in for a bay. There's a hostess in front that answers your questions as you wait. At the time, it was an hour-1.5 hour wait, which was fine. We decided to hit up the restaurant while we wait.   The server got our drink order and wanted to take our credit cards to open a tab but she was gone for about 15 min, and no credit cards and no drinks, evidently the computers went down, which is also fine. it happens, especially opening day. But because of the delay, when the drinks and food finally came, our bay was ready, which they let you know via text. So we told our server, which they will take the food and bring it to your bay. The idea is pretty good, but the execution needed work. In addition to our food being moved around, my friend ordered a steak sandwich well done, but it came with a stick that said well done but it was very very pink, like medium rare, so he sent it back, and it was made again and it was rarer than the first! So the manager came and apologized and remade the sandwich again, and it was finally well done, and they comped his meal. So, in my opinion, it's opening week, busy as heck, I understand it's probably like Hell's Kitchen inside, and the manager resolved the situation. So I couldn't give a full five stars on my review.  Entertainment wise - the place was great! After getting our bay, a hostess goes over the options, answers questions, and how to operate everything. There can be up to six people playing in a bay and no experience necessary. You just hit the ball and the closer to the target and further the target, the more points you score. I haven't been to a driving range in over 5 years, and after a few practice swings, you get the hang of it. It's just like bowling but it's golf! You have 20 balls to score higher than your friends. Afterwards, we played some pool, shuffleboard and xbox games. Great fun and I totally recommend trying it out!

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Billiards
Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The bays

7LhnoiroGxGpj8rM1S791w.text: Great place if you want to hit some balls.  I am not the best but had lots of fun and the drinks are good too.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. A view of the range.

F18L06_Z-E7Y-dwL1BNMpw.text: Super fun spot! My son always asks if we can go when we are in AZ. We really need one of these in Vegas. Its a chill spot to go with family, have a fun night out with friends or just by yourself to hit some balls, major stress reliever. The atmosphere is fun and exciting, lots going on.  Been here a few times and always left very happy!  Unfortunately, this last visit our service was short of horrible. We sat at the bay for almost 15 min before I finally tracked down someone and asked for our server. What made it even worse was the table right next to us (5 males) had been checked on by same female server 3 times (when we started counting) without even acknowledging us, imagine our surprise when we realized that same female server was the one who ended up attending to us before passing us off to yet another server (who BTW was actually really great). (-1 star for service)  Guess its a good thing people don't go to topgolf for the service.

Er-dAgFiLnmbqUcwORANgg.text: I am the Vice President of Product Marketing for Plantronics. We were launching a new set of products that we wanted to announce to our partners and customers. We needed a venue were we could have a first-rate meeting, show the products to our customers, but also something that might be different than a hotel ballroom. One of our team had heard of Top Golf and suggested it.  I was a little bit nervous because it is a non-traditional venue. I thought it might be too noisy and too distracting. I was also worried that the mix of professional and social might be off-putting to some of our customers. I was wrong.  We used the meeting room on the main floor. The AV facilities were first rate. There are lots of monitors and great overhead audio. We selected round tables all facing in. One of our presenters uses a wheel chair so we didn't want people seated too deep. The catering was very good. It was markedly better than typical hotel catering and more cost effective. The view from the room onto the field was superb but the black out curtains made sure it wasn't a distraction during our presentations. We did run into a small issue with hallway noise that was quickly rectified when we spoke to staff. We also noted that they weren't ideally situated for large equipment pack-in, pack-out. If this is something you need to do, I would have a storage truck in the parking lot and move in and out from there.  Speaking of staff, it was the staff that made the day. Thomas and Amber stood out as two people who just knew "how to make it right". The exceeded my expectations, not just by providing incredible, thoughtful service, but by caring about the success of our event. It felt very genuine. I have done a lot of events in any time, and I cannot recall enjoying working with a team so much. Of course there were many people on their team that were also involved --- too many to mention by name, but each person wanted to go out of our way. What's more, they weren't just doing this for us. I watched how they worked with the regular guests.  They really seemed to care. In any place, that would be amazing, but in this environment, it was especially unexpected and helped make our customers feel very welcomed.  Everyone enjoyed the social events of golf and pool. Being able to order food off me u rather than from some banquet list really kept everyone happy. The cocktails were a little premium-priced for straight up entertainment, but less than at a hotel venue.   We were so happy with our Product Launch. Our customers and partners loved it. The staff really made it work well. A different attitude from the staff and I am not sure this venue would have been as successful.  Roadside signage isn't ideal. Some people noted it was hard to find. The building is obvious once you know what you are looking for. It is a beautiful facility.  We will use this facility again and we will also look at other locations for similar events.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Our customers and partners loved the venue.

mraibCUhqi9oNE-NCTNwRg.text: I'm a pretty active person and love trying and playing sports. So, from time to time, I like to come here and humble myself with the reality that golf is still something I suck at. After slicing and shanking away, I usually get in a comfort zone and start to hit fairly far and accurate-making myself feel better. If I can't do that, I'll just look around at the hundreds of people there that are struggling even worse than me-and that'll make me feel better instead.  The food and drinks here are really good, a bit more elevated than your standard sports bar type food. Some cocktails are a bit pricey, but, the more you drink the less you care about your crappy golf swing so you tend to go with it regardless. Atmosphere is fun, always neat to come with friends. If you are good at golf, bring your friends here and revel in the fact that you are superior to them.  Sometimes, the popularity of the place is a bit overwhelming so it gets a bit crazy. Going in the AM is both cheaper and less chaotic. I do sometimes get scared when a lane of children is next to me. Between the fear that their swing is so bad that I'll get hit and their erratic approach/follow-through that causes me to worry their about to tumble over the edge, it can be a be unnerving.

1COfwYirjhW119qLAIAFKQ.text: Great spot for people who love golf and socializing. Decent food and drinks. Great for big groups of people. Will be back.

Ln59zHrZvHQG0jS-lFknnA.text: This was my first time doing top golf, and I had a blast. The golfing part was a ton of fun and the facility is very nice. There low point for me was the food. It wasn't terrible, I was just hoping it would be great. I had the meatball sandwich sliders, mushi, and a beer. The food was just ok. Overall I will def be back, just with lower expectations for the food. Service was good...

Hg7Db8bqFdyPnmNy1cCakw.text: I had an awesome experience and I recommend everyone to try it, I brought my 7 year old and her 10 year old friend. They had a blast I was absolutely surprised, it's great for adult gatherings also. I always bring my family in and out of town. It's a sophisticated retreat from the busy Scottsdale scene. You feel like you are out on the town and doing something very different and trendy. I always like to do something classy and in the scene and this is the place to do it. Our server and instructor August, was awesome and I am going to special request he will be helping us on our next visit.

x2Ul7gEfjuYqjbBhZdlfEw.text: wow! dill and allie were so enthusiastic, they were apart of the Marketing scout. honestly it felt like i've been to Topgolf a hundred times, they welcomed us with great joy, gave us a great over view on what to do and they made the process simple and easy. More people like them should be hired!!   autocatalyticdehydrohalogenation (ask them  to pronounce it, joke is they can't)

6nywP9wELFjxQjx1FsGE6A.text: This is a review of the restaurant. Usually the nachos are pretty good. However, I recently came and had the Mushi plate. It was terrible. Do not order this. It was very very dry. The service we had recently was also pretty bad. Normally the experience is good, that is why I am rating this a 3. The service is never consistent.

qatOHPjLsKUwQlxS_sq3iw.text: Taylor from golf services was great! Thanks for a great experience. We are active duty military and she took care of us. The wait was not bad because of all the other amenities. Well worth the drive from Tucson.

PEtekC8J5A7lV9Pc-28qnA.text: I have been coming to this place since it first opened up. On this particular visit though my group had the pleasure of Dakota Storm Parrish as our waiter. He was very attentive and even though it was a busy Friday night he definitely made sure our drinks were filled and answered all of our questions about the menu. As long as Dakota is going to be my waiter I will definitely be coming back for such great service.

g6ezN62v80m_fCt2oFLY8g.text: Topgolf was a lot of fun the first time we went! This one is really cool at night with the Casino in the back with the lights they have on it. It seemed funny that they had the out door heaters on when it was in the 70's out side but I guess thats what you get when you go to Arizona

ZfwjDDxeZUmyKKYy9BECng.text: Never done before was fun need to extend the far fence. Very nice facility and the food was good too. Would go back

ehKQbrgp_VEfZ7Y5tvGwBg.text: Fun place, food, drink and driving range, good combo, lot of money walking around. The only complaint is the barrage of emails you will receive after your visit.

TuUl2snGJuYv8Vs-k2aV0Q.text: Worst customer service ever. I am in Phoenix on vacation. Cool place to golf, too bad the interactions with staff aren't up to the challenge. We were given a twenty minute wait time. They said they would text when our turn was up. Thirty minutes later-no text. We went and checked and they said  they text five times. We showed them our phone with no texts.  And the dude said "oh yea, well, sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't." No sorry, no embarrassment. They did not care. That was one example I have others that I won't put here. Customer service is dead! I should stop caring.

MIe-ZbrJ3XKtI6ya9NHYmQ.text: I have never actually felt the need to write a yelp review until today. This was my first time at top golf and it was a great time. While we waited to golf we sat in the bar and were waited on by Matt Snyder. He was clearly extremely busy and still managed to provide us with outstanding service as well as great food and drink suggestions. He gave us a great experience and made the wait painless. I would highly recommend this place for a good time.

9V2sjRUJYEWk__WT_iNOfg.text: Let me start by saying that we love Topgolf! Good drinks, decent food and overall a good time. Being from Seattle WA, we don't have anything like this back home and make a point to include Topgolf into our Arizona vacations, atleast once a year. This time though, we came in on a Saturday afternoon with our family and were expecting it to be busy. We were quoted a two and half hour wait time; long, but considered well worth it to us. We decided to sit in the bar and enjoy appetizers and drinks while we waited to golf. When we were reaching our quoted time, we went to the front to ask about how much longer we could expect. The person working informed us that their systems had been down that day causing longer delays and that it was going to be about another hour and half on top of the two and half hours we already waited! Being highly disappointed, we decided to leave. We understand that stuff happens, but they should've let us know about the system delays and extra long wait times upfront so we could've decided to go else where instead of wasting one of our vacation nights waiting for nothing. We could've spent our waiting time driving to the other location if we knew it was going to be THAT long. Like I said, we only make it down here a couple times a year and look forward to visiting Topgolf everytime. Between the 7 of us, we spend atleast $300+ each visit. We were so disappointed I don't know if we'll waste our time coming back. Topgolf is fun, but not worth having to wait 3-4 hours, especially when we're here out of town for only 3 nights. You can have wings and beer anywhere!

lRTwovkAIdhk4VWqB4GdIQ.text: This place kinda sucks. Food sucked, tiny portions too. Moscow mule sucked, was really a vodka soda. White whine sangria sucked, was pure white wine only. Ice cream "Sunday" sucked, it was scoop of ice cream with syrup on top. Food comes or at weird times, meals came before appetizers.   Oh and the 3 hour wait to play golf didn't help  Seems to be a hype about this place not sure why  Waiter was great that's about it

WvW0bAzXIatw4m4MaOLjjg.text: This is my second post since first going to the TG Scottsdale. The first time was on Fathers Day this last June 2104 about 4 days after the grand opening. It was a crazy disorganized day, but not unexpected. On the whole I was pleasantly surprised, given my initial skepticism, that this format would work for a modern driving range. On that first visit my wife had overpaid and TG gave us a credit for a future visit.   So Labor Day we ventured out again, to sample another TG experience. The checking in process was painful, considering we had a TG issued credit, that no-one could figure out how to enter into their computer system. We were bounced back and forth between check in and concierge, and finally the manger had to use his own override to fix it. So up we went to a third floor bay. It was empty up there, and somewhat of a surprise. The bay would not accept the credit issued and we waited 20mins to get this resolved.   Then I noted they had no woods or hybrids in the TG rack? Why I thought. Turns out its because most modern golfers now, can clear the far fence and hitting cars in the Talking Stick Casino parking lot. Ok bad design flaw TG .   So why can't women use some as required and handed back after the session is complete? My wife prefers these clubs and does not have a long range, so she did not enjoy the very limited clubs on offer, which by the way have horrible grips now, after only 3 months.   I'm confused what Top Golf is trying to be, because if it's families then I'm offended I can't be trusted to behave with a long club or 3 wood while on the other hands perhaps the liquor and beer crowd cannot, hence the long club ban.   It's already beginning to unravel which is a pity, because it has great potential for both families and millennials looking for a bucket of beers, nachos and to drive some cool shots 250 yards.   It's meant to be a driving range, so make it one.

MzhyKr9BjvezD5t6Pmm8wQ.text: Had a great visit to this location.  We are platinum members in Colorado and stopped by here.  Our host Michelle was very kind and efficient to get us to a bay and playing.  She was very friendly and knowledgable!  Our server Betsy was fantastic also!  Great to talk with, suggested great beers for us to try and very attentive!  Then of course the place and games are a blast!  Food left a bit to be desired, but with Michelle and Betsy you couldn't do better!

iZ37ONth92bjMUERm5vJHw.text: One of my favorite places to come when I have the time! I am not good a golf in the least; however, Top Golf makes golfing fun even for people who suck at golf! The staff is very friendly and the food and drinks are great! If you go, be sure to go at night and avoid the bottom floor if you can so you can see the amazing view! For those of you who have never been--GO! You won't regret it!

Su5hVp6cpHVnhI6JoRrn9A.text: I coordinated an event here for my company and although the golfing was fun and interactive the food was not good. Our food was catered, so we didn't individually order off the menu. I'm not sure if that would make a difference but our food was pretty dry. We had sliders, chicken strips, queso cheese dip, chicken patties, chips...in other words happy hour food. But majority of the group wasn't pleased with the quality. One thing that stuck out was how aged the lettuce and tomatoes looked, as if they had been sitting out for a while. Therefore I'm giving this place 3 stars for the entertainment.

QO3Fy_YE4UOyIEmagdl35w.text: Went there in May 2015 for my mother's birthday party. The party consisted of 12-15 people. My father pre-ordered quite a selection of food to be served buffet style.... He mistakenly ordered entirely too much food! Quite literally there was enough to feed 40-50 people easily. We had so much food in fact... Much to the chagrin of the staff, my dad offered food to the 8-10 college aged kids at the bay next to us which they were very delighted and accepted. There was so much food... Everybody was figuring out who was taking what but then "the manager" (what a tool) informed us we "can't take any food home, it's against the health code". If been to umpteen restaurants in Scottsdale and they always bring out a to-go box. I think the staff was extremely upset because they could see now that multiple bays next to us the guests were eating the "catered food" & was adversely affecting there business. Ridiculous.       Also, if you go there when it's hot, they have industrial unsightly misters that will do nothing but get your clothes damp/wet. My eyeglasses literally had to be wiped every 20 sec. When asked to adjust the settings, we were told there was "nothing they could do".      Finally, if you like to golf enough to where you own your own clubs... BRING THEM!  The "house clubs" are so bad and beat up. Top golf couldn't have bought them at even at a second hand store. These clubs would be something you'd find in your grandfathers attic from circa 1972. Oh and BRING YOUR MONEY AND BE READY TO PART WITH IT!!! Simply take a look around at their multi-million dollar facility. The customers pay dearly for it with their outrageous gouge pricing on everything

dP0skwb_NX1KDx4Y2RGETQ.text: Do not come on a Friday night. We got here around 7pm. The place is so packed it took us 3 hrs for a bay. We decided to get food while we wait. The food area was packed with loud drunk people. The waiter forgot to put in three of our orders but it still took an hour to get the food he didn't forget. We had to wait an additional half hour for some chicken tenders and chicken and waffles. When we finally got our food they messed up both burger orders. The waiter was nice enough about it. Generally the workers are nice.

J-3QImO3qHUTs2D4HO2wNQ.text: I had a great time celebrating my boyfriends 23rd birthday, the food was great and our server Camila was awesome, thank you so much! I recommend the nachos, delicious!

cJIzJlo39FR7cR-_Jt4Ikg.text: (Lyrics - Murray Head - One Night in Bangkok)  Topgolf, Occidental setting But Scottsdale does know what the city is getting The creme de la cream of the golf world In a game with everything but Tiger Woods  Time flies - doesn't seem a minute Since the Arizona Casino spa is just across from it All changed, don't you know that when you Play at this level there's no ordinary venue It's Tempe, or Chandler, or Gilbert Or Or this place!  One night at Topgolf and the world's your oyster The bars are open but their drinks aren't free  Top Golf ... what is the rave about!?  Needless to say this place is pretty awesome.  I'm not much of a golfer but I can see the fun in coming here to wack the hell out of a golf balls while pounding down a few drinks.    The place itself is huge; 3 floors of fun and a central bar inside.  The crowd and staff is lively and service seems on key. Though I'm sure they have seen and dealt with the worst; dealing with drunk golfers - ishh!  I came here for a birthday party and didn't seem like any of our orders missed a beat.  I ordered a beer and a some chicken tacos and had a taste of the Mushi, a burrito like appetizer stuffed with beans, rice, cilantro, cheese, and chicken.  It's shaped like a sushi thus I gather the name Mushi. My thought, well mushy indeed it was since it felt it was just a bunch of "mushy" ingredients stuffed together in a roll; I appreciate stepping outside the box, but please stay shut Pandora's Box!  My chicken tacos however were awesome! Crispy taco shell stuffed with smoked chicken and atop with a slaw.  Smoky it was while the shell and the slaw provided a textural crunch to every bite.  Perfect to go along with my beer.  It has some heat along, but the cabbage slaw helped calm it down.  Overall, a darn good bite for a fun golf place! - Enjoy!

Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

eGCxWDAw4eem9s1oVRo45Q.text: My review is not of the actual golfing (alleged two hour wait turned into a non-existent event), but of the service and food at the bar/restaurant.   We sat at a two seater table. Never. Not once. Ever. Did waitstaff approach the table. Never. Did I say never? My companion went to order food at the bar - I asked for the grilled cheese off the kids menu because I did not want meat. They plop a brisket grilled cheese in front of me. I say something about how this has meat and the waiter says "yeah it's awesome and walks away" never to be seen again.   Want a water? Have to go to the bar. Want a drink? Have to go to the bar. Want the food you ordered? Go somewhere else.   Maybe next time I'll get to play and my review will change.

oatzggFNZDJkyAE14LUKAg.text: Went in this weekend with a group of 10 while on my buddy's bachelor party. Since we needed 2 bays together,  there was over an hour wait,but we did not mind. We ordered some food and had some drinks while we waited.    The food took a long time to come out. They called our group at the same time our food finished. They sent our food down to our bay but made us pay the bill upstairs causing some of our meals to get cold.    The golfing itself was a blast and thats why the 4 stars.  We all had a great time even if we are not very good golfers. Since we were in a big group the price was actually pretty cheap. Better time and cheaper than bowling.   Wish we had a top golf in the bay area!

LAvDef8Xgo8u4RVWhTKKMA.text: Came here for my cousin's 30th birthday with 9 people and had a blast! We came during a weekday from 12:30-4:30 and didn't have to wait at all for a spot on the third floor (prime spot!) Our servers name was Luke and he took great care of us - including complementary golf lessons! Highly recommend for a fun outing with friends, work, or a date!! They have huge Jenga and cornhole if you have to wait for your bay to be ready.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Scenic golfing!

gDcT5LgrR5tYKm1QLh6HAA.text: Angelo was an amazing booth attendant. We were in town visiting from Seattle and had a blast. He offered us lots of advice, being that it was our first time here. He helped make our experience great and was a fun partner to work with. We will definitely recommend Topgolf here in Scottsdale to all of our friends traveling to town.

tNELj8PPP3ajngz6dR5Tew.text: Top Golf is our go to place to take friends, family or host work events! We have always had such a great experience each time we are there.  Yesterday we had the privilege of having Chandler serve us and this is our second time having him. He is fun, very attentive and overall a great host!

nVcGFfBv86Wpr4MFPvAf6w.text: Well, we're probably not your typical clientele.   An Uncle and his 13 year old nephew.  We're from North Phoenix, not dressed right, not golfers, certainly not there for drinking at 8 AM on a Saturday.  Only reason I'm there is from sharing the wealth after winning at poker from the Talking Stick (a stones throw away) the week before.  And from the moment we walked up, we get the Scottsdale stuffy that I half expected.   "What up?" from the front desk guy, not a "Hi, can I help you?".   A manager looking lady gives my nephew some vague warning about how he can't bring his Dad's club up to the range, as if he's a threat of some kind.   "You'll have to walk that back to the car, sonny."   Then, after doubling back, We get the brief instruction on the electronic scoresheet as almost an afterthought - didn't tell us how to switch players or even how to get the next ball out of the machine.  But the waitress Kaylan shows up, drops off our water (sorry, but no alcohol for you, young fella, she says).   And then when she sees that we are total hackers, she goes ahead and offers, "would you guys like any tips?"   "Sure".  "Well you might start with the men's club rather than the women's...." And goes on to correct the nephew's stiff swing, slows down my rushed approach and in short improved both of our games by 100%.  She goes on to check in on us every 15 minutes to see how we are progressing, giving my nephew a confidence surge with each correction and by the end of the day, the "kid" is during 160-180 yards with semi-consistency.   Obviously, Kaylan went out of her way, where any normal waitress would've said " well, won't be getting any tips here" and instead saw us as the eager-to-learn beginners that we really were.  Kaylan's made this spot visit worth every minute.

JLOHOJFbTJ2BiGlIu0RP4g.text: Unsatisfying experience? Trying to have great time enjoying my boyfriends birthday and they suggested they would rather not serve us! I was a little loud I will admit, but I was totally coherent and our server was under the influence of other substances.  We decided to leave and asked another co-worker of Austin's if he was under the influence of illegal substances. The co-worker totally threw Austin under the bus and agreed that he was under the influence. I highly recommend another venue if you are looking for a great night.

WVWVFcejSYvFmChM4VRV6g.text: Sandra Jan is amazing,  represents the best of Top Golf.  Great food.  Good drinks.  Even if too cold for golf.

AHzf_BNXVkZev7SZ_wz3xA.text: Thanks, great job by the Topgolf crew! Ryan M. (Doors) took great care of us for our party..you are the best!

_4jgWGC93r7IUrEKOYUD1Q.text: Love this!!!! Brady was our guy and did a fantastic job explaing things to this first timer...I will soooo be back!!!!

nX11yz1ahN-6F-zlCtq1Sg.text: Had an amazing experience at Topgolf for a corporate event tonight..:   Brandon our server and lead onsite contact was spot on and attentive to all our needs.  Would highly recommend for your next team building activity.  Swing away  :-)

BVZpDIfH2azX8t18P0h31A.text: I have been here numerous times and always have a good time. Kassey was a great server and played along with our shenanigans. I will say I end up spending more than I want, but you  can't argue with having a good time.

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. This jagweed trying to golf

iH4UoDA0JAbtX_hORTwOjg.text: We visited Topgolf a few days ago as a party of 4 kids (8-11yrs old) and 4 adults. While we probably should have registered and made a reservation ahead of time, the staff were not flustered, they worked quickly, joyfully and efficiently. The staff engaged the kids, walked them through the safety, the computer and game play. We were swinging clubs within 15 minutes of coming through the door on a pretty busy night, which was in itself impressive.  The server was very attentive to the adults and kids. The music, beverages and food etc. were perfect for our families. The staff were hungry to please and make sure our needs were met. We left feeling like this is a place we would want to bring our kids every time we are in Scottsdale even for a snack and some refreshments. Our kids were talking about it on the plane ride home.  The impeccable service didn't end there. When we got home to Canada we realized that one of our kids left their own club in a rental set that night. Naturally we were upset and being 2500 km away we were not hopeful. We sent an email to Topgolf and within 24 hrs the Director of Instruction, Jesse Hughes PGA, called me to say he had our club and he wanted to make sure we got it back. His concern for my child being without her club was palpable on the phone and as I type the club is on its way back to me courtesy of Topgolf.  It is clear to me that Topgolf has great culture, they hire talented individuals and place a premium on the client experience. Thank you Jesse and team, your service has left a lasting impression on us and we cannot wait to come back and say thanks in person.  On a final note, golf needs more champions like Jesse and his team to grow the game, this was a "home-run" for Topgolf and for the game of golf.

6OB7KSDVhFmcYo5AUIr1KQ.text: Golf was fun but our bartender was nasty. He was rude from the beginning and it only got worse as the night went on. He was the worst bartender I've ever had. We were on the roof, 3rd floor at the bar. I wouldn't treat a stray dog, foaming at the mouth like this bartender treated me and my friends.

2yr-Jl9ZHBvp2C1s9RooCA.text: We had the WORST service from the bartender on the third floor last night (7/13).  I am in the industry so I get it, but this bartender was just outwardly rude and made it clear he did not want to be there any longer. I get he wants to be cut and we may be keeping him longer but he would have made a lot of money if he wasn't so disrespectful. My group alone spent over $500 together, we will be going elsewhere from now on. I've never been so blatantly disrespected by a bartender.

whNkmMPzk_NKf4zTQDWEaw.text: Went to this location for a holiday work function...pricing for around 1pm was decent and we could all share the hour (for the driving range game) so that was cool!!! Food was pleasantly surprisingly good, lol! I ordered the shrimp and grits- which was yummos. My coworkers' burgers looked good, and tasted good. Customer service was excellent - our servers were quick and efficient!

photos.caption: Photo of Topgolf - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

vZFwoGR1dp5tiyzr0_V8Vg.text: Great experience, I'm horrible at golf and so are the friends I went with, but it was fun. We never felt bad or embarrassed because of our skill or lack there of. The server was great as well as the food. Will be back again for sure. Btw no chipmunks were there!

XbC7lHynIDtgaTC15Dy_6w.text: Great entertainment and venue for the whole family ranging from the ages of 12-50. Loved the ambience filled with music and the football games on TVs. The staff at Topgolf truly cared about our family and having a first class experience! We will definitely be coming back!

Wd28clrV8GSpeBxHc_NJiA.text: Cool concept. Topgolf combines the ease of play that putt-putt golf provides with a game-like atmosphere similar to bowling in a driving range setting. There are 3 levels which can fill up fast on the weekends, so getting there early is recommended.  We came here for a friend's birthday party and enjoyed the beautiful weather. There are different games that you can play, all centering around hitting your golf ball in a certain colored zone. This means that even though you might be a seasoned golfer, you won't necessarily gain points if you don't hit the ball in the exact area where the zones are. You can bring your own clubs, or they have ones at the range that you can use, separated by number/type and by what distance they can hit.  Prices here are by the hour, and are tiered by time (Morning, afternoon, evening). The morning times are the cheapest by the hour, with prices increasing as you approach evening. We got here around 9 A.M. when they open, and there was already a line out the door.   In addition to the driving range, there are overhead TVs so you can watch professional golf while playing golf, an indoor lounge area, and tables where you can snack, imbibe, or have a full meal. The menu itself consists of bar/party type food such as fries, sandwiches, and some wonderfully delightful donut holes that you fill with your choice of 3 different flavors.  Service here was excellent, provided by our server Ashley.   Overall it's a fun place if you're looking for a group activity that provides casual sport, food, and entertainment. Just be sure you know how to swing that golf club without injuring yourself, since I twisted my wrist while swinging and it's still a little sore a few days later!

Pj0aM2l8t_6aCR5DsoFUzw.text: As I said in my tip. I'm kinda having my doubts. The place is beautiful, the staff are nice. But, I give it three stars for organizational skills. Meaning the web site and phone recorder says no reservations bullsh$&!!! But, when you get past it all, it's like a fine working clock works for some reason. Throughout the chaos and the mayhem things all fit together as one.  Thank god we ran into Beverly, she was a god send, she was very organized, friendly and most of all patent. It was nice getting an explanation from someone so gifted as her.   Once you get through the queue nightmare it really is very nice. A beautiful dining / bar area. Very nice bartenders who sling a premium drink. After an hour away, which wasn't too long considering we were sitting at the bar and having drinks, we were texting to go to the concierge for our position on the course. Once you get there I host it takes you to the course and explained everything to you so you know it backwards and forwards, and then explains the games. He did a great job. The games are great a lot of fun Lotta good fun competition and I recommend this place highly.

5bKsbOO7mKhVtLLArFVGYg.text: A very entertaining place to get your golf swing on. It's a lot of fun even if you don't play regularly or seriously. It is a must-stop place every time I come to Arizona. Staff is awesome and encouraging. They also don't push you to buy more, or upgrade, or seek lessons. That's something any consumer can appreciate. You need to be careful about avoiding peak hours - not only do they get VERY busy, but the price to play can jump up a lot. It's $25 per hour in the mornings, but $50 per hour in the evenings. I think I'll stick to my morning golf routine :)

The food is good and the service is really great.  Friendly staff always ready to help out and be at your service.  I'd definitely go again, but when my pockets are a little more full.

AYoC5j53qZL4tyFkRYxx6g.text: Disappointing. We have come here several times and whatever wait they quote you, add 30-45 minutes on and that is when you will get a bay.  Service in the bar was spotty, one guest at our table got his chicken sandwich right away while the rest of the table waited 20 minutes for their food. Drinks would arrive in waves because "no one could find our table" in the bar and server would have to bring them. They also ran out of bloody mary mix at 3 pm on a Saturday.    Bays are dirty and are not cleaned, other than the tables, in between guests.  They also allow valet service to take up 1/3rd of their lot so if you come past 6 pm on the weekend, be prepared to pay $5 to park
